messagesdadas01_Antonio:{While freeing Sonja from The Gloom, I missed Yvette, who kept a brave face against Faugrimms' Beasties! She is the one! denug:[quest_offers(Chapter1_Ant_Hunter_01)]}
message01_Yvette:{I don’t know how you can stand battling the Gloom Lord and his minions day in and day out. Me? I could use a dashing prince to help me get through it. Do you happen to know any?}
message01_Izzy:{It was TOTALLY boring in the Gloom. You're an absolute DOLL for rescuing me! We're gonna have a blast!}
message01_Antonio:{We have stuck together this long,you and I... Join me in my Adventure Club, and we will be ready to defeat Senor Shadow!}
message01_Yvette:{Could you help save my childhood home from the Gloom? The cottage is near a river. Don't fall in!}
message01_Izzy:{I've got it! I'll go into the family business. Everyone loves a good fortune teller, right?}

experiment.name: castle_test
experiment.description: These experiment is for testing purpose only

experiment.name: castle_slow_boat_v1
experiment.description: Viral alternative loot drops for expansions (gem shards), castle buildings (royal seals), and pm quests (mystery loot).

experiment.name: castle_reputation_drop_rate
experiment.description: This experiment is for testing the rate at which a user gets reputation from neighbor visits

experiment.name: castle_invite_friends_dialogs
experiment.description: Experiment for variables on "Invite Friends" MFSs during FTUE. Variables: 1. with/without cancel button 2. standard/prepopulated MFS 3. prepulated with all friends/with only zynga friends

experiment.name: castle_tracking_gameaction
experiment.description: Experiment for tracking doober drops and harvests

experiment.name: castle_mfs_select_all
experiment.description: This is to mitigate recent dev relations information and the disappearing notifs issue. The experiment lets us toggle ‘select all’ on and off based on FB and dev relations asks, and has a 24 and 50 batch variant to investigate the disappearing notifs issue.

experiment.name: castle_fullscreen_request
experiment.description: Suppress popping out of fullscreen for frictionless requests

experiment.name: castle_energy_drop_rate
experiment.description: Experiment to tune energy drop rates from performing actions

effect.title: Yvette: Note from father
effect.message: message01_Father:{Dearest Yvette - I hope this note finds you well. I can't reveal too much, but I've found something that could change everything. I've hidden it safely away. Do you remember the gift you'd leave for me every morning? Search there. -Love, Your Father}

complexToolTip.info_0: Read:{A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!}

effect.title: Yvette: Note from father
effect.message: message01_Father:{Yvette - I found a magical portal in a large circle of stones. My curiosity got the better of me, and I ventured through it. I discovered a world rich with treasure, and I brought one back for you. Remember your favorite food for lunch? Think about it and you'll find a clue to the treasure.}

complexToolTip.info_0: Read:{A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!}

effect.title: Yvette: Note from father
effect.message: message01_Father:{Yvette, you only need to look a little bit more, I promise. But this one may be a bit harder for you. Be brave and overcome your fear, and you'll find the hidden treasure. In the meantime, be careful. I fear something dark crept out of the portal and into our world.}

complexToolTip.info_0: Read:{A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!}

effect.title: Yvette: Note from father
effect.message: message01_Father:{Yvette, I hope you're the one who found this. And I hope you are safe. I fear what dangers the portal may bring. A dark smoke has started to seep out of it - covering the land and forming strange creatures. Someone or something evil is behind this. Take this golden egg and sell it. Use the coins to get as far away from here as you can. I must find out what is behind this darkness and try to put a stop to it. For you, sweetheart.}

param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is fending off a Beastie attack and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Join the fight and claim your rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Super Clobber}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Super Clobber in the Market or Trade with Friends. The Super Clobber allows you to banish a Beastie in a single swing!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Use 1 Super Clobber from your Inventory and find a Beastie to Banish}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Choose a Beastie with the most hit points left to get the most out of your Super Clobber!}

dialog.title: title:{On Guard}
dialog.description: description_George:{There are a lot of beasties around here. You need a special potion to help defend against them.}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{Those Beasties will think twice before they come here again.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom could use some protection!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is fending off a Beastie attack and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Join the fight and claim your rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore 2 times}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click in the Gloom to explore}

dialog.title: title:{Be Proactive}
dialog.description: description_George:{Notice how Beasties always come from the Gloom? If we exploring the Gloom, maybe we'll find more.}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{The Gloom is full of Beasties! That is a good thing to know.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Click in the gloom to explore.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom could use some protection!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is fending off a Beastie attack and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Join the fight and claim your rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 5 Stones}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Mine Rocks to gather Stone}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 6 Castle Walls}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Castle walls can be purchased in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Fortification}
dialog.description: description_George:{If we built some strong castle walls, they might keep the Beasties out.}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{You're doing well! Those are some good walls you built there.}
dialog.hint: hint:{Castle walls can be purchased from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Visit 5 Neighbors}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Neighbor Bar to Visit}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Charisma}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Reach out, your Highness. The key to your next test does not lie with me.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{A wise man once said, strengthen your ties, and you will find a bulwark in the dark times ahead.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 5 Decorations}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Landscape Architecture}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You've guessed this is a test of charisma, yes? So, how will you win over your subjects?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You've brightened the lives of your people without disturbing my garden. Excellent.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give Residents 2 Gifts}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Residents in your Kingdom will want specific items to make them happy.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 250 Happiness}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Give Gifts and Complete quests for Characters to raise Happiness}

dialog.title: title:{A Gift for You}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{And how will you recognize those that are worthy among your subjects? Not including me, of course.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Nice touch, your Highness. They may write songs about you yet.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 1 Bazaar}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear 1 thing - Placeholder}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Real task is trade 5 items}

dialog.title: title:{The Advantage of Trade}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You cannot trade on charisma alone. Or can you?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{A wise man once said, self-sufficiency is a fool's objective. Plus, charisma keeps you flush.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Construct 2 Castle Buildings}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Great Hall to buy Castle Pieces}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax 3 Castle Buildings}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Castle Buildings to Tax them}

condition.message: condition_3:{Reach Castle Level 4}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{Nobility}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your charisma inspires people's faith in you, and nothing inspires faith more than a big castle.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Ah, yes, that will do. You pass the test. Please contain your excitement.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Clear 1 thing - Placeholder}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Real task is complete 10 quests}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Compassion}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You're strong, appealing, and courageous. But if you have no compassion, you'll just get a big head.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Your subjects will remember your compassion for their troubles.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Build a River with water sections}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 5 Water tiles in the Nature tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 15 Nature Items}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Nature tab of the Market - pink bellfowers work on this quest for now}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Flowing River}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Compassion does not begin and end with your subjects. You must consider the land as well.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{A wise man once said, the land supports you as long as you support it.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 5 Animals}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Feed 20 Animals}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Animals to Feed}

dialog.title: title:{Restoring the Flocks}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{And what of the smallest creatures? Ah, don't act like you've never saved a lost, lonely cow before.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You've shown compassion for those who can't speak for themselves. But what of those who can?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Construct 2 Villas}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Shelter from the Storm}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Some who struggle would do well with your compassion, but are too proud to ask.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{A fine choice for your people. A wise man once said, a brick house is not easily blown down.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 10 Cabbage}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 10 Cotton}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Farm Plots to Plant new Crops}

condition.message: condition_3:{Reach Castle Level 6}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{The Good Earth}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Have you passed the test of compassion? It is not up to me, but the land.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The land has given you its support. You pass the test of compassion! Enjoy. The last test is next.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore 3 New Areas}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Raise your Castle Level to Explore}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Courage}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Delve into the Gloom, your Highness. Reclaim the kingdom... if you dare.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The test of courage begins, but it will never truly end, as more enemies become aware of you.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 4 Gloom Rats}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Gloom Rats to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Begone Beasties}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You must have the courage and the stamina to stave off the Beasties that frighten your people.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Be sure of it, you will face more of these Beasties... very soon... In fact...}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 3 Gloom Wolves}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Gloom Wolves to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Wolves at the Door}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{...now. You must Banish yet more Beasties. Don't look at me. I don't make the rules.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Excellent. This test is nearly at an end, which is good, because I need more rocks for the garden.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Bash 2 Neighbor Beasties}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Beasties to Bash them}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Good Neighbor}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You have the courage to defend your own, but will you risk yourself for your friends?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Yes, marvelous, but - Curses. Something's happened, but you're not allowed to interrupt the tests.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Rescue one person from the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore Gloomy Areas to find people to rescue}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear 1 thing - Placeholder}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Real task is accept 1 new quest}

condition.message: condition_3:{Reach Castle Level 5}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{Bring in from the Dark}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{A few people have gotten lost in the Gloom. Will you risk the test to save them?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Well done. This was the last part of the test: courage when it doesn't serve you. You pass.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Construct 1 Crafting Building}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Crafting Buildings in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Strength}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Many arduous tests lie before you. I'd give up right now. No? Good. That was the first test.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Yes, the second is a test of strength. I had to explain it to the last glorious noble. Twice.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 2 Items}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft items in any crafting building.}

dialog.title: title:{Harder Than Stone}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Not so fast. You think a few chops at a cherry tree is all it takes to win the crown?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{That's more like it. You've strengthened your arm, and I've gained rocks for my garden.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move 2 Buildings}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Select Design Mode to Move Objects}

condition.message: condition_2:{Carry 20 Stones}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Mine Rocks to Collect Stones}

dialog.title: title:{Weight of the World}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{So you're strong, but can you move mountains? In this case, I will also accept buildings.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Interesting choice, but you don't get extra points for artful arrangement.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Construct 1 Workshop}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase a Workshop}

dialog.title: title:{Strength with Purpose}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{And when conflict comes, as it always does, will you have the strength to defend your people?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Excellent. I trust you have the strength to continue on. I'm sorry. I'm required to say that.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Get 2 Clubs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Clubs in the Workshop or Trade with friends}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 1 Archery Target}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Archery Targets in the Castle tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_3:{Reach Castle Level 3}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Construct Castle Buildings to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{A Show of Strength}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{And when conflict comes, as it always does, will you have the strength to defend your people?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{These weapons will serve, for now, so you have passed the test of strength. Celebrate. I'll wait.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 2 Mines}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Construct 1 Mill}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_3:{Construct 1 Fishery}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy in the Building tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Prove Your Wisdom}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{I rarely get this far! So, uh, hm... Ah, here: wisdom is using what is hidden. Not too clear, is it?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Yes, it's a riddle. The mines and waters here are rich with resources, and you are wise to use them.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 3 Forging Items}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Forge items at a Workshop}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 3 Cooking Items}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Cook items at a Kitchen}

condition.message: condition_3:{Craft 3 Artistry Items}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Create items at a Studio}

dialog.title: title:{Arts And Crafts}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Some resources remain hidden until held in the hand. Another riddle!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Exactly! Great resources are crafted in the hands of your craftsmen! Are these riddles too simple?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Reach Level 16 in any Profession}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Items to increase Crafting Level}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 5 Items}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Items at a Workshop, Kitchen or Studio}

dialog.title: title:{On to Mastery}
dialog.description: description:{Here's a harder one. Is it wiser to be a master of all, or a master of one?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You have chosen... wisely. But be flexible. Another skill may serve you better in the future.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 1 Vault}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Market to buy Castle Pieces}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax 20 Buildings}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Houses and Castle Buildings to Tax them}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 10,000 Coins}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Tax Houses and Castle Buildings for Coins}

dialog.title: title:{The Prudent Ruler}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{We've come so far. Answer this: what gives your kingdom more, the more you take?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Yes! The more gold you have, the more you can buy to benefit your kingdom! I'm a little excited!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 1 Throne Room}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Market to buy Castle Pieces}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 10 Castle Walls}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click the Market to buy Castle Pieces}

condition.message: condition_3:{Reach Castle Level 7}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Construct Caslte Pieces to raise Castle Level}

dialog.title: title:{A Worthy Castle}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The crown is so close. Just answer this last riddle: What makes you tallest only when sitting?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Yes! The more gold you have, the more you can buy to benefit your kingdom! I'm a little excited!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is looking for a stranger trapped in the Gloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is hoping it's not too late!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Share in the rescue effort with some extra Energy!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Energy}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Campfire to light the way out of the Gloom for the stranger.}
condition.hint: hint:{Buy the Campfire from the Decoration tab in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Fish for 2 Pails of Water... Just in case the fire gets out of control.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Fish to uncover the Pail and other items in the pond. It takes some time for the pond to restock.}

condition.message: condition_3:{For the safety of others, clear 10 Rocks, Plants, Dead Trees or Stumps.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{If you run out of things to clear, you can always buy them from the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Walk to the Light}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{This Murky Mist, it has engulfed our stranger! Let us dispel the Gloom and light her way to freedom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{I've not seen a finer fire since I gave an imp a log bouquet. Yet still the lady is trapped in the Gloom!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] just found Sonja the Pirate!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{This fierce pirate has some tales and booty to share.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{She also has an extra Crystal Shard for you.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Crystal Shard}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Find and Rescue the Mysterious Stranger and her House from the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Rafael mentioned he last caught a glimpse of the Stranger and her House while standing on a Bridge by the River.}

dialog.title: title:{The Mysterious Stranger}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{It is time. Let us cut into the Gloom and bring home our beautiful, mysterious stranger! Ahem. How do I look?}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You saved the stranger from the Gloom, but I'm afraid others will need your help. Senor Shadow wants this land!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] got sticky. The good kind of sticky.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] helped Rafael with his famous Hot Rock and Honey Massage.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{The free Coins are only slightly sticky with honey.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 6 Honey to help with the rub down.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Tend Flowers to get Honey.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Stones for Rafael's Hot Rock Massages.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Collect Stone from Mining Camps or mine rocks.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Rolling Pin, to roll out the knots.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Rolling Pins.}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{We have learned a valuable lesson. The lady is not hiding on a whim. This mysterious stranger has some business in the Gloom... or perhaps the Gloom has business with her! Let us double our efforts, friend!}

dialog.title: title:{Work the Kinks}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{If we cannot end her captivity in the Veil with light, we must lure the lady out. And few can resist my famous hot rock massage!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{The stranger remains trapped in the murk! Ah well, you shall have the massage instead. No?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Wanted: The Dark Master and his Gloom Beasties!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] spread the word about The Dark Master and his minions of Gloom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Prepare for battle with this free Energy!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Energy}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Love Letters to send to the trapped stranger.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Love Letters.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Unwither 1 Crop in 3 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit 3 different Neighbors and Unwither 1 Crop in each of their Kingdoms.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Earn 20 Reputation Hearts.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.}

dialog.title: title:{Spread the Word}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{It's true! The Gloom is a trap. Wax dummies don't lie. We must send courage to the imprisoned lady!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You spread word of the Gloom's perils? It is a creation of Senor Shadow, who turned day to night! Stay vigilant!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{It just got real up in kingdomName:[world.worldName]!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] and Rafael did their part in the great Beastie purge. Will you do yours?}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Here is some XP to help you on your way!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Consume this free Gloom Rat Potion, side effects may vary.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Beastie Potions are kept in your inventory, they will summon a Beastie. Other potions can be crafted in the Kitchen as well as purchased.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Animal Bones as proof of your heroism against Senor Shadow's Beasties.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Senor Shadow will summon Beasties when you perform activities, like clearing or harvesting, in your Kingdom.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clobber 1 Beastie in a Neighbor's Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Beasties to clobber them in a Neighbors Kingdom.}

dialog.title: title:{Fear and Loathing}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Hmmm, if my Hot Rock Massage wouldn’t draw her out, the lady may fear Senor Shadow’s Beasties in the kingdom. Have at them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Your might would astound Elmor the Unflappable, which I did only once! What is wrong with this lady?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is warning other Kingdoms of the dangers of the Gloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Who else besides player:[player.firstName] will rescue those lost in the Gloom?}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{It's a risky job so take some free Coins.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 20 Wood Logs to make wooden warning signs.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Chop trees to gather wood logs.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Use 1 Super Chop from your Inventory and chop a tree.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Choose a tree with the most chops left to get the most out of your Super Chop!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clear 3 Tree Stumps from Neighboring Kingdoms to encourage them to put up signs and not stub toes.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Clearing Tree Stumps gives you more room to build!}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{I am certain that the lady is a product of the Gloom! But wait. What if I am wrong? It could happen twice. If we doom her to the inky fog, Rafael could not live with himself. Let us continue with the rescue, yes?}

dialog.title: title:{Warning Signs}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{The Grog, it did nothing! The image of the lady still haunts me! We must place signs, or others may join her, encased in the grim fog!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{I'll build signs to warn others about the Gloom... and limit your liability if they still get lost!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has their Grog goggles on.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] enjoyed some Bubbly Grog made from Ogre's Belch.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Don't worry about the calories. Cod pieces have a slimming effect.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Ogre's Belch}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Bubbly Grog to help drown out memories of the Lady.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Bubbly Grog can be crafted in the Kitchen.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 1 Keg in your Kingdom to keep the grog coming.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft a Keg in the Workshop and place it from your inventory. Tah-dah!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Feed 1 Cow in 4 different Neighbors' Kingdoms, you know, for fun.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 4 different Neighbors and Feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{Momentary Distraction}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{I cannot sleep! Is the lady a trick of the Gloom meant to lure US in? We must distract ourselves!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Iss an excelente Grog! The Gloom shtranger can't distract uss from our cow's duty. I said duty. Cow's duty? Huh?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is playing with their new wax dummy. That's normal, right?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] made a wax dummy of Rafael to trick the Gloom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Have some Bees Wax to make your own dummy.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Bees Wax}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Change your Character's Outfit to put on a dummy.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Customize your Character any way you see fit!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 7 Beeswax to create a wax dummy of Rafael.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Tend Flowers to get Beeswax.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Flasks to fill with the scent of Rafael.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Flasks.}

dialog.title: title:{Send in the Dummy}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Maybe the Gloom traps any who enter, including the lady. I will venture in to test it. Remember me!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Ah, yes, the old send-in-a-fake-version-of-yourself trick. A great way to save a marriage, too!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is lighting the way through the Gloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is fighting off evil forces in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Take this Spyglass to help you find your way.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Spyglass}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 3 Brick or Cobblestone Courtyard to pave the way to the stranger.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Courtyard can be purchased in the Roads section of the Market, under the Market tab.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 3 Lanterns to light the way from the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy decorations from the Decor section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Raise your Castle Level by 20 points to better face the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Some items in the Market, like Castle Walls or Towers, will raise your Castle Level.}

dialog.title: title:{A Noble Cause}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{The Gloom, it wavered before your nobility! Build your kingdom, and this Mirthless Mirk will fall. Eh, I hope.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{It's time! The lady paces the Gloom, as if caged, like the lion I bested in a staring contest. We must try and save her now!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is playing matchmaker!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{With player:[player.firstName]'s help, Rafael made a romantic meal for Yvette.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{That's the way to a woman's heart, right? Here are some left overs.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 5 Mystery Meat. Known ingredients? No. Delicious? Yes.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Mystery Meat.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Use 1 Hyper Craft from your Inventory.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Use Hyper Craft Potions to Craft items faster.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Fried Fish, one for Rafael, one for Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{You must have a Kitchen, Mill and Fishery to Craft this item.}

dialog.title: title:{Fried Fish and Love}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{How could I have been blind to Yvette? I am smitten! My friend, will you help me win her heart?}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Yvette is a vegetarian? Ah well, I have learned something about her... and gained a meal.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 1 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is doing some heavy petting in their Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Rafael is trying to win Yvette's heart, with player:[player.firstName]'s help.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a free Baby Chick and do some heavy petting too!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 5 Animals for Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Nature tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Hay Bales.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Groom 1 Animal in 5 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 5 different Neighbors and groom 1 animal in each of their Kingdoms. Only a fed animal can be groomed.}

dialog.title: title:{Animal Lover}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Yvette cares not for high cuisine, she wishes to save animals from Senor Shadow's control. If I, too, care for animals, she will love me in return... I think.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{I cared for the animals so much, they must be put on a diet! I fear I am worse than the Gloom.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 2 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s been on their hands and knees all day!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] helped around the Kingdom with some chores!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab a Pail of Water and mop up some rewards!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Brick Ovens, to show willingness to help out with the chores.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Help Neighbors 15 times with chores.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Accelerate Neighbor buildings or collect from them and earn rewards.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Yardwork. Water 10 Saplings.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Saplings need to be watered several time to fully grow.}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{A true lover does not dwell overly on his beloved. He seeks to bring value to the world, and thus lure his love to him. Also works on puppies.}

dialog.title: title:{A Helping Hand}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{A woman's heart is no easy prize. You need kindness, strength, and willingness... to do chores.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{My baking, not so good. But putting out fires, I’m an expert. May come in handy against the minions of Senor Shadow.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 3 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is bulking up!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Between carrying rocks and anvils, player:[player.firstName] is looking cut!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get pumped up with this free Energy!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Help Rafael show off by crafting 1 Anvil for him to lug around.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move 10 Rocks around to show off those muscles.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Design Mode and select Move to move objects.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 6 Dragon Scales to show that you are not afraid of overgrown lizards.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Dragon Scales.}

dialog.title: title:{Show of Strength}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{In the end, you and I, and maybe a few others, will stand together to save the Kingdom. What more could impress Yvette?}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Yvette was not even watching?! I must find a way to impress her, so we can face off against Senor Shadow together... eh, holding hands. Hopefully.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 5 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is no Picasso!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] helped Rafael with a little art project of love.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Here's some free Berries to make some blue ink!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Parchment for a portrait, to show Rafael's artistic side.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market..}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Bottle of Ink for the portrait.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Feathers for quills.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Feed Adult Peacocks to gather Feathers.}

dialog.title: title:{Art of Love}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Now that the chores are done, I have noticed there is such drear because of the Gloom. Painting a portrait of fair Yvette is sure to dispel it!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{I'm a fool to think Yvette's beauty could be captured on canvas! So I painted... a goblin in a wig.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 4 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is taking it up a notch.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] showed the Beasties who's boss and wants to share rewards with you!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Flex your muscle and collect some Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Spend 20 or more Reputation Hearts.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax Rafael's houses 5 times, to show his responsibility.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{When a house is ready, click on it to tax them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clobber 1 Beastie in 5 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 5 different Neighbors and Clobber 1 Beastie in each of their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{A Good Word}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Yvette cares not for showy things like rubies or peacocks. In times like these, men of honor are needed.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Your word is worth more than gold! Yvette has agreed to be wooed! Woohoo!}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 7 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Oh, Shiny!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is helping keep his people in royal bling.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some Royal Jewels to keep your Kingdom blingin' too!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Rubies, for jewelry, to show generosity.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Mine Rocks to find Rubies.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 5 Silver Ore.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Silver Ore comes from collecting from Mines.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Feed 5 Peacocks neighbors' Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit Neighbors to perform various activities.}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{I have wooed many a lady. Many. But none of my professions of love work like they did with the others. The many others.}

dialog.title: title:{Ooh, Shiny!}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{I now realize showing my muscle was wrong. Actions speak more than a thousand gifts. Unless those gifts involve ending the Gloom. Or jewelry.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{The peacock, it has swallowed the necklace! I have elected not to wait for it to, um, reappear.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 6 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Smells like LOVE… and Chocolate!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is helping Rafael craft some Chocolate Bars in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Craft your own love bites with some free Coins.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect from 5 Bakeries in Neighbors' Kingdoms. Well, the good bakeries.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit Neighboring Kingdoms and Collect from their buildings.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 1 Chocolate Bar for Rafael to woo Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen and bakery. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 15 Berries for Rafael to feed to Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Tending flowers will give you berries.}

dialog.title: title:{Berry Sweet}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{My date with Yvette, it must be perfect ! Will you help me prepare, my friend?}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Ah, these berries! They are almost as sweet as Yvette. Now, for the date!}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 8 of 10}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] gave Yvette a happy ending!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] just experienced the stuff of fairytales and wants to share the fun with you!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get your fairytale and collect some Energy now!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Look for others in need of rescuing in the Gloom. Well, at least 2 times.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You must have Exploration Crystals, Coins and specific Castle Levels to explore.}

dialog.title: title:{Save the Date}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Such beauty! But I can't woo Yvette when Gloom threatens our world. Let us take steps to end it forever, my friend.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{The Gloom will fall, but until then, I must say goodbye to Yvette. Fate may reunite us.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 10 of 10}

condition.hint: hint_2:{Clear grasses, flowers, or tree stumps}

dialog.title: title:{Bump in the Night}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Something was creeping outside my house last night. I couldn't see it, but I- I'm not scared.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{It came back last night! I couldn't tell what it was, it avoided the light.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Pail of 'holy' Water just in case}

condition.message: condition_3:{Tend 3 Buildings you are crew of in Neighboring Kingdoms. Check for vampires while you are there!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit Neighbors where you are part of their building crew and tend that building}

dialog.title: title:{Count Dracula?}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Vampires like to count things. Help me get some Animal Treats and it'll get stuck till dawn!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{No Animal Treats and no vampire! It must be the most powerful vampire ever!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Flax}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Why would a Vampire like Flax, only Baz knows. Grow Flax from Farm Plots or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 20 Oats to test the Vampire}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need.}

dialog.title: title:{Banging in the Night}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Don't think it's a vampire? We'll test it by leaving something boring out, like Oats.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Wow! The Oats are gone, too! No vampire would want Oats. Unless it's vegetarian.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Clubs from a Workshop or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Cotton}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Harvest the Cotton from farms or Trade Neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 20 Flaxseed Oil. It's a lot, but Baz wants a big flame}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Very flammable stuff! Craft Flaxseed Oil in the Kitchen or Trade Neighbors for it}

dialog.title: title:{Search the Night}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{I'm going hunting for whatever is stumbling around at night. Um... could you help me make torches?}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{I saw it! Sort of. It was big. I followed it, but it had longer legs than me. I bet it's an Ogre!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 25 Honey to tempt the ogre}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Get Honey from clearing flowers. Plant more from the Market, if you run out.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 30 Berries, ogres love them}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Berries from clearing grasses. Plant more Grasses from the Market, if you run out.}

dialog.title: title:{Attraction}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{If this ogre likes Oats, it'll love something sweet! When it comes, I'll rush out with my sword!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The sweets are gone? But I didn't see the monster. I only closed my eyes for a second, I promise!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Flour Sacks in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_2:{Get 5 Fresh Pails of Water}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Pails of Water by fishing}

condition.message: condition_3:{Search Neighboring forests for signs of more footprints, Chop 20 trees}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Chop trees in Neighboring Kingdoms}

dialog.title: title:{Big Foot!?!}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{I found a huge footprint, see? Let's make a cast of it and show it to Alastair!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Alastair says the monster is a giant. I bet it's a one-eyed giant looking for its missing eye!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 6 Hard-Boiled Eggs. They do feel like eye balls!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{One-Eyed Ogre Hunt}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Eggs and fish. The giant will think the eggs are its eye. And the fish, well, you'll see!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The giant ate the eggs! I guess it isn't missing an eye. But now we can smell its fish-breath!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Jelly Doughnuts}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Have a Bakery and Craft Doughnuts or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 10 Neighbors looking for the ogre giant}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click a Neighbor from the Neighbor bar below to visit them}

dialog.title: title:{Sweet Tooth}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{We should bait a trap for when the smelly one-eyed ogre giant comes looking to eat our eyes!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{I'll just test that chocolate to make sure it will do the job.}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_1:{Use 1 Rat Potion to summon one of The Woeful Wizard's nasty Gloom Rats.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Market or craft it in the Kitchen, then use it in your Inventory.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banish 1 Gloom Rat.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Earn rewards like crafting materials by banishing Beasties.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Gather 3 additional Crystal Shards by Banishing Beasties or asking your friends.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Banish Beasties to gather Crystal Shards. You can also ask your friends for them.}

dialog.title: title:{Shard Work}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{We've got our treasure-hunting equipment. Now we need to banish some of Old Gloomy's Beasties!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Ha! Those Beasties don't know what hit 'em. Now we've got the shards we need to explore the murky mists!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom comes fully equipped!}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{After my shipwreck, I hid some treasure chests around your Kingdom. But now they're lost in the Gloom! If you get your hands on my booty, I'll share it with you!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 1 Shovel to dig up the Treasure Chest.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 1 Shovel from the Decor section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Barrel to haul dirt.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 1 Barrel from the Decor section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Spyglasses to search for treasure.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Spyglasses.}

dialog.title: title:{Digging It}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I'm glad you're aboard! First things first - we'll need some treasure-hunting equipment!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{With equipment like yours, my chest is as good as plundered! Rafael will be so jealous.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Everything is crystal clear now…}

param.name: caption

condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect Coins 5 times from Neighbors' Kingdoms' houses.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit Neighboring Kingdoms and collect Coins from their houses.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 1000 Coins so you can explore!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Collect taxes and sell items or tend animals and crops to get Coins.}

dialog.title: title:{Shards and Crafts}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Beasties have their uses, after all. We can craft an Exploration Crystal from the Crystal Shards they dropped!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{With these crystals, you can dispel the murk hiding my treasure!}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 4 Stone Walls to protect the Kingdom from the forces of evil.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{The bigger your Castle, the more Gloom you can dispel!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 4 Moats to form a barrier.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Moats from the Nature, Water tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 3 neighboring Kingdoms to check out their fortifications.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{From your Neighbor Bar, Visit Neighbors' Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{Protection}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{We can't leave the Kingdom unprotected from the Dark One's schemes while we're treasure hunting. How about some walls and a Moat?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Hope those fortifications are enough to keep the Beasties out. They're sneaky blighters!}

param.name: title

condition.hint: hint_1:{To explore, craft Exploration Crystals from Crystal Shards dropped by banished Beasties, then click in the Gloom.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect Gloom Wolf Hair for 3 Beastie decoys}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Banish Gloom Wolves to collect Gloom Wolf Hair.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Royal Jewels for the decoy Beasties' eyes.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Royal Jewels.}

dialog.title: title:{Scare Beastie}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{A decoy Beastie might scare the real ones away. Let's build one, then go after my treasure!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Aye, you know how to get your hands on some booty! Have you done this before?}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 5 Rope to haul the Treasure Chest out of the mud.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cow to use as a counterweight.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 1 Cow from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Open that Treasure Chest!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Have the Rope and Cow first, then click to open the Treasure Chest.}

dialog.title: title:{Stuck in the Mud}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Arrgh! My treasure chest is stuck in the mud. Get some Rope - I'll keep an eye out for Beasties!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Whew! That was tough work, but the chest is mine. I mean, ours!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Feeling a bit... groggy?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Must be Sonja's Bubbly Grog. It's good stuff!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Raise your glass and get free Bubbly Grog from player:[player.firstName]!}

param.val: loclinkText:{Get Bubbly Grog}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Flasks to hold Sonja's best grog.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Flasks.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Go Fishing in neighboring Kingdoms to relax. Fish 5 Times.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit Neighbors and click their ponds to catch fish.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Sell the Cow. She knows too much!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Use the Sell option in the Designer Tools to sell items.}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{The only thing better than grog is gold. Let's open up that chest!}

dialog.title: title:{Take a Break}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Now that we've got the chest, we can relax. But sell the Cow...she knows too much!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Aye, that's better. You've got to know when to relax… and when to sell Cows that know too much!}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 5 Dragon Scales. They might be tough enough to break the lock!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask Friends for Dragon Scales.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Smash the Treasure Chest's lock!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Have the Hammers and Dragon Scales, then click to open the Treasure Chest.}

dialog.title: title:{Sonja's Chest}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Arrgh! I can't find the key to the chest. We'll have to break the lock!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{The blasted lock won't break! We've got to get this chest open before more Beasties show up!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Down with Gloom, up with bloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is restoring life to their Kingdom in CastleVille!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Join the fight and grab some Coins!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 5 flowers, something pretty.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Nature, Plants section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Feed 3 Animals, keep your creatures healthy!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on hungry animals to feed them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clear 2 Rocks in your Kingdom to prevent Yvette's toe from getting stubbed.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Clear a rock by mining it until it's gone! As easy as that.}

dialog.title: title:{From Gloom to Bloom}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{We have to bring life back to the forest, before the Gloom wins! Down with Gloom, up with bloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{My anti-Gloom slogan is catching on! This is much better than my first idea - wearing a meat dress.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s got perfect hare!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{The bunnies in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom are perfectly happy away from the Gloom!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Hop on over and grab a Carrot. Your bunnies are jealous!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Carrots}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Plant 14 Carrots. They're wort their weight in Coins!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 14 Carrots to feed the bunnies.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Fully grown Crops to Harvest them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Give love to your Neighbors' crops, too! Accelerate a crop in 1 Neighbor's Kingdom}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit a Neighbor and Accelerate 1 crop in their Kingdom}

dialog.title: title:{14 Carrots}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{A slogan isn't enough. Animals are stuck in the Gloom! Like bunnies. Won't you help the bunnies?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Whatever the Gloom is, it makes bunnies hungry! We can't stop now. The whispy woe is everywhere!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is feeling plucky!}

param.name: caption

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 4 Chickens, there is nothing sadder than a hungry Chicken!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Animals tab in the Nature section of the Market. Click to feed Chickens when they are hungry.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 16 Flax.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.}

dialog.title: title:{Chicken Lover}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Nothing says down with Gloom more than bringing more life to the Kingdom! Let's do it!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Down with Gloom, up with Chickens? I'll work on it.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Everybody's flocking to player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName]'s Chickens are happy enough to dispel the Gloom. Well, almost.}

condition.hint: hint_1:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Your Neighbors' animals could use some love, too! Feed 8 Chickens in Neighboring Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Neighbors' hungry Chickens to feed them.}

dialog.title: title:{Bird Feeder}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I haven't come up with a Chicken slogan, but there is a Chicken dance. Feed them and you'll see!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Did you see the Chicken dance? How can anyone be Gloomy after that? Um, besides the Beasties.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has bovine inspiration!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is raising Cows to fight the Gloom!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Moo-ve on over and grab some Coins!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 2 adorable Baby Cows.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Nature, Animals tab of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 20 Wheat to feed your animals.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Wheat Crops}

dialog.title: title:{A Bit Bullish}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I was so sure those happy Chickens would vanish the Gloom. We need more life! Lots of cute life!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Aww, they're so cute! I'm calling that one Gus. How's that for happy?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] won't be cowed by the Gloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is keeping their herd safe from the forces of evil!}

param.name: description

param.name: ToastText

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 8 Wooden Fences to keep the animals safe.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You can Craft Wooden Fences if you own a Worshop or buy in the Decor tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move 2 Cows. Carefully!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Design Mode to move Objects.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Your Neighbors' Animals could use some love, too! Feed 1 Cow in 2 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 2 different Neighbors and feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms. Click Neighbor Cows when they are hungry to Feed them.}

dialog.title: title:{Fence Me In}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I can't -huff- catch Gus -huff. Our Cows are going to run right into the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Whew! That was close. Poor Gus was almost Gloomy!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kindom is for the birds!!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is looking out for our fine feathered friends and has Coins to share!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 3 Trees.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Bird House.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decor tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Water 6 Saplings.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Saplings from the Nature tab of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{For the Birds}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Our fences created a Gloom-free haven for all, from the birds to...Oh. Forgot the birds.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Now it's a safe haven for all... except for the poor Beasties!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Can I keep him?}

param.name: caption

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 2 Wooden Clubs.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Sell 1 Iron Axe.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft an Iron Axe in the Workshop. Sell items from your Inventory.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Sell 2 Wooden Clubs.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft in a Workshop then sell from your Inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Peace is the Answer}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{If we show the Beasties some love, maybe they'll stop being so Gloomy!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Take THAT, Gloom! I'll rehabilitate all the Beasties, just you watch.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is showing the Beasties some love!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{They're not the most cuddly of creatures, but Beaties have feelings, too! I think.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Let 2 Beasties live in your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties or use a Beastie Potion.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Keep Off Sign to protect the Beasties from visitors.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decor tab of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Beastie Collection}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{We can make a little home for the Beasties right here, out of the Gloom. Won't that be nice?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Now that they're out of the shadow, I'm sure the Beasties will cheer up!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{My, what big teeth you have!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Watch out, player:[player.firstName]'s Beastie is a bit... bitey.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Mystery Meat and RUN!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Mystery Meat}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Keep the 2 beasties safe a bit longer. They may just be hungry...}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform activities in your Kingdom to attract Beasties}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move 5 Animals away from the Beasties.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Design Mode to move Objects}

condition.message: condition_3:{Get 4 Mystery Meat to feed the hungry Beasties.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Mystery Meat.}

dialog.title: title:{Beastie Confection}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Eek! One of the Beasties nearly ate Gus! They must be reaaallly hungry. Let's feed them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Ow, ow, OW! That Beastie bit me! I guess it doesn't like Mystery Meat, either!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{kingdomName:[world.worldName] is in full bloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom is full of life. Take that, Gloom!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab a Red Tulip while it's in bloom!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Red Tulip}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Rearm the Kingdom, Craft 3 Wooden Clubs.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banish the 2 Beasties. Gus will be happy!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Beasties to Banish them.}

dialog.title: title:{Beastie Banishment}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Alastair says that Beasties are minions of the Gloom Lord! I hate to say it, but they've got to go!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Never mind the Beasties, look how much life we've restored! Down with Gloom! Up with bloom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore to Find Tom in the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Explore Gloomy areas to reveal Tom's location}

effect.title: title_01:{Tom: The Knight}
effect.message: message01_Tom:{Good day to ye! My name is Sir Thomas, but you can call me Tom. You MUST need some help if you've come calling for an old knight like me. I warn ye, it will take a lot more than swords to deal with the menace you're facing. But you're young, and ye look like you have a good head on yer shoulders. I'll share the wisdom of my years with ye. And if me back holds out, I may help with a fight or two.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Give Tom a new Sword as a sign of good faith}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Tom to give him a sword}

dialog.title: title_02:{Good Knight Tom}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{There is a magical cave that will help us on our quest to dispel the Gloom. Who better to assist with a quest than a knight?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Tom is a noble knight always ready for adventure. I'm sure he will help you!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Rope}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Ropes at the Workshop}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 6 Ropes to catch the ogre giant}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Ropes at the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{The Snare}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Now for the trap. We'll have to dig a huge pit, and spikes and – Ok, ropes work, too.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{I think I pulled the rope too soon. My mother usually did this part.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move 3 Items}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Build up your strength by moving things in your kingdom.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Chop trees 20 times}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on a tree to chop it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Drink 3 Energy Potions}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Energy potions can be purchased in the Market and drunk from your inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Strength Training}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{So, you're lookin' for a cave? There's far worse than Beasties in the depths of the earth. You'll need some trainin'.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Feelin' any stronger? I hope so. That's all the trainin' we've got time for!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore where Baz placed the Trap}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Select a new area not far from where Baz was a tree}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Carrot Cake to use as bait}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Baz can't resist Carrot Cake, how can an ogre? Craft Carrot at the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Placing the Trap}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Finished! I've placed the Trap where I last saw the Ogre.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{There's... uh, just one thing...}

condition.message: condition_1:{Find the Crystal Cave in the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the map area to explore the Crystal Cave}

condition.message: condition_2:{Bash all Goblins}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Goblins to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Cave Dwellers}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Aye, the cave you're lookin' for is nearby. Explore just a wee bit farther!}
dialog.finish: finish:{A Dragon?! By Nessie, I haven't seen one of them in years! You're sure you want THIS cave?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have one stone - Banish the Dragon}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Dragon to attack it}

dialog.title: title:{Surprise Attack}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Dragons are fierce, but we've got the element of surprise on our side. CHARGE!}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Well... that could've gone better. Looks like we need a new plan!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 10 Pails of Water}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Fish to get Pails of Water}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 stone - Dowse the Dragon}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Dragon to dowse it with water}

dialog.title: title:{Fire Fighter}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{That dragon will roast us to a crisp unless we find a way to block its fire. Got any ideas?}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{A clever plan, but ineffective. We need to draw the dragon out of the cave to fight.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 10 Eggs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Chickens to acquire Eggs}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Stone - Throw Eggs at the Dragon}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Dragon to pelt it with eggs}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: Oh please help me find my egg!}

dialog.title: title:{Shell Shock}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Dragons are prideful creatures. Pelt it with eggs - that'll draw it out of the cave!}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Bless my beard! Never in my years have I seen a dragon cry. How very strange!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is looking for a few good men!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is helping Yvette catch a prince and receiving Reputation points in return.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Fish 10 times in a neighbor's kindgom to try and catch a frog.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the a Pond to fish from it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 15 honey to help make the kiss less gross.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Clear Flowers to find Honey.}

dialog.title: title:{Flies to Honey}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Do you know how to find a prince? I've heard that kissing frogs can work. Let's get it over with.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Yeeuck! Tastes like flies. But with that honey, it might catch on.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Sweet dreams, Yvette!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Yvette is sleeping soundly thanks to a whack on the head from player:[player.firstName].}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Take advantage of the situation and get some free XP.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Cotton Cloth for Yvette's bed sheets.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You must have a Studio and a Tailor to Craft this item. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Wood Club, to knock Yvette out. This is gonna hurt!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Love Letters so Yvette can send them to a prince.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Love Letters.}

dialog.title: title:{Beauty Rest}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{One prince wants to wake his love with a kiss. Let's give it a go! I'll just need a sleeping aid.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{(Yawwn) No prince came by? Oh bother, and now I have a splitting headache!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Something's fishy in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Note to self: Don't use real fish scales to make a mermaid costume.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Hose Yvette and player:[player.firstName] down with a free Pail of Water.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Jaime}

param.name: ToastText

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 15 Bass for a mermaid costume. No fish were harmed in the making of this costume.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Find by Fishing}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 2 Shells to make a bikini top. I hear they are all the rage this season.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Find by Fishing}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 4 Royal Jewels for Yvette's mermaid costume.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Royal Jewels.}

dialog.title: title:{Siren Song}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{My mother was a siren. Maybe I can disguise myself as a mermaid and enchant a prince with song.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Peew! It's hard to charm anyone when you smell like dead trout! I need to go take a bath.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Move over Rapunzel!}

param.name: caption

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 7 Gloom Wolf Hair so Yvette can have REALLY long hair.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Dye Kits so Yvette's roots aren't showing.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Hairy Tale}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Who wouldn’t rescue a damsel in distress? I’ll lock myself in a tower. And I’ll get hair extensions.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Ow, ow, ow. Have you ever let someone climb your hair? It HURTS.}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_2:{Have a Tailor so Yvette has somewhere to work.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy a Tailor in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 20 Wheat Bundles to spin into gold.}

dialog.title: title:{Spinning Wheels}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Some creepy little man will teach me to spin straw into gold if I can guess his name. Can you Help?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{I think all I spun this straw into is a bad case of hay fever – achoo!}

param.name: title
