condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Mining Camp to harvest it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Iron Pick so the short miners can work.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{You must have a Workshop and a Blacksmith for this craft. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{The Fairest One}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{A magic mirror suggested I could meet a prince if I moved in with some short miners.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Let's never speak of this again. Those little guys were creepy! And all they had to eat were poison apples.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Ouch! You try dancing in those things!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Yvette left her glass slipper at the ball and player:[player.firstName] carried her all the way home!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{In return, player:[player.firstName] has some extra XP to share.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Cotton Cloth for a Gown. Yvette needs a new dress anyway.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You must have a Studio and a Tailor for this craft. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 8 Sand to make a glass slipper for Yvette's slipper scheme}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Go Fishing to find sand}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 1 Friend's Kingdom to take Yvette to the ball.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on the Neighbor Bar to Visit.}

dialog.title: title:{If the Shoe Fits}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{A nearby kingdom is throwing a ball! What say I show up and “accidentally” leave behind a slipper?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Oh my aching feet! Now I know why people leave glass slippers at a dance.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Little Red Riding Who?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Yvette's been getting unwanted attention from wolves. Maybe red's not her color?}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{player:[player.firstName] saved her and has some Energy to share.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Energy}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Thief Cloak to venture into the woods with.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Banish Thieves to find Thief Cloaks.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 25 Tomatoes to color the cloak red and guard against skunks.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Place Farm Plots to grow Crops.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Mystery Meat so Yvette has something to take to Grannie.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Mystery Meat.}

dialog.title: title:{Hoodwinked}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I'm running some goodies into the forest to attract Gloom Wolves - and a brave prince. So don't interfere!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{A dozen wolf attacks and not a single rescue! Maybe I should look for a dog instead of a prince.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore to find the Dragon Egg in the Gloom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the map area to explore and find the Dragon Egg}

condition.message: condition_2:{Bash a Thief}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Thieves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Egg-Napped}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Fightin' a dragon is one thing, but stealing its wee baby? Dispicable! We've got to find Ember's Egg!}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{With all those Thieves, this must be the right place!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is looking for loot in CastleVille!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{There's just one problem. Sonja's treasure chest may be a little bit… cursed!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Coins before the curse strikes!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{Are you ready for another treasure hunt? Of course you are!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 3 Iron Picks to break the lock.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop and Blacksmith. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Shovel to dig up treasure. This could get dirty - just the way I like it!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 1 Shovel from the Decor tab in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Craft 1 Rope to haul the chest.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{On The Hunt}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Before we set off, let's gather some supplies. We'll be moving a lot of rocks so come prepared.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Aye, I'm expecting trouble with this chest. I stole it from a witch, and she had the nerve to put a curse on it!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] ain't afraid of no curse!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Sonja's Cursed Treasure Chest doesn't stand a chance!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{You might want to grab some Coins now. Just in case.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{I still can't find my key! Have 10 Animal Bones for skeleton key.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Banish Beasties to gather Animal Bones.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Tend Here Sign so Neighbors will take care of things while we're gone.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy from the Town tab of the Decor section in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Eyes of Newt to give Alastair so he'll lend a book on curses.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt.}

dialog.title: title:{Curses!}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{There are still a few things we need to do before finding my chest... like researching the curse that witch put on it!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Alastair's book about curses says that we need to be lucky to overcome the curse on the chest!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 6 Ropes to hold everything together}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Ropes at the Workshop or Trade with your Friends for it}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 20 Wood Planks to make a really huge trap}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Wood Planks at the Workshop or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Bag of Nails}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Have a Blacksmith and you can Craft Nails at the Workshop or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Building the Trap}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Promise, this is the last set of ropes. Hurry, or the ogre giant will eat your eyes!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Uhh... up through the loop or down? I'll get it! Um, maybe come back later?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Do you feel lucky?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is getting lucky to defeat an evil curse!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get lucky and grab some free XP!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 20 hungry Chickens belonging to Neighbors. Their wishbones are supposed to be lucky!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit Neighbors and feed their Chickens when they are hungry. Grooming won't do.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 3 Clover Patches. Maybe we'll find a lucky 4-leaf one!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy from the Plants tab of the Nature section in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Wishing Well to wish for luck.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy from the Decor section of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Get Lucky}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{There's something strange about this curse. Let's gather all the luck we can before we go near that chest!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Do you feel lucky? Well, do you? I think I could be luckier. I'm not taking any chances with this curse!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is an ogre-achiever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] is the best monster-hunter in all of CastleVille and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Pluck up your courage and grab some rewards!}

param.name: linkText

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 4 Sacks of Flour to make a huge pie}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Flour Sacks in the Kitchen or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 30 Strawberries no Ogre can resist}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Harvest the Strawberries from farms or Trade Neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_3:{Click the Trap to set the Bait}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Gather the items above then Click on the Trap}

dialog.title: title:{Baiting the Trap}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{A big, bad bear ate the bait! It came with teeth and – Ok, I was hungry. Making traps isn't easy! Let's make a pie this time.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The trap is set! I can't wait to see the ogre giant! Do you think I should change my name to Baz, ogre-catcher?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Search Rocks for 1 Dragon Egg}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Rocks to search}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Stone --Give Dragon Egg to Ember}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Ember to give her egg back.}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: Oh thank you! But I'm stuck!}

dialog.title: title:{Over Easy}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{That egg must be around here somewhere! Check those rocks - they look like a good hidin' place!}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Well done! Mama and baby have been reunited. But our work here isn't done yet!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is SO charming. No, really.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] hopes some charms will make their luck last!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Coins before the luck runs out!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 15 Cabbage to feed the rabbits. Lots of lucky little feet - better when attached!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Plant Cabbage in empty Farm Plots and harvest it when it's ready.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 15,000 Coins. One of them is bound to be lucky!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Tax houses and Royal Buildings for Coins.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Buy 1 new Hat from the Market. Pick a lucky one!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy from the Hat tab of the Clothes section of the Market.}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{You know what? I DO feel luckier! Let's go find that chest!}

dialog.title: title:{Charmed}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I'd feel a lot better if we had some charms to bring us luck when we open that cursed chest.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{The Second Pirate Rule is to always be prepared. I'm still feeling a bit nervous, but we're about as prepared as we could be.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] added a subject to their Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] caught me a new best friend and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Be a pal and collect your rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have one Knife to cut George out of the Trap}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Knife at the Workshop or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_2:{Click the Trap to Cut George Free}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get the Knife then Click the Trap to cut George free}

effect.title: George: Miner Extraordinaire
effect.message: message01_George:{Uh... hi, there! Sorry again about eating your food. I've just been lost in the Gloom so long, I'm starving! If you let me stay, I’ll help you fight the Beasties!}

dialog.title: title:{Free Me!}
dialog.description: description_George:{Oh, dear. I seem to be trapped. I thought it was okay to take the food.}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{Oh, it's you, your Majesty! You run an odd kingdom, but I'll stay, if you'll have me. Name's George.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 5 Sticks of Butter}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Sticks of Butter.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 5 Ropes}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Ropes.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Stone --Free Ember}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Ember to free her from the cave.}

effect.message: message1:{EMBER: I'm free! Thank you!}

dialog.title: title:{Buttered Up}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Ember was in such a hurry to get her egg back, she got wedged in the cave! We can't just leave her like that.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Butter is good on a great many things, but who would've thought a dragon would be one of 'em? Look at her go!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is spreading the love!}

param.name: caption

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Feel the love and grab some free Reputation!}

param.name: ToastText

condition.message: condition_1:{Build up goodwill: Have 4 Neighbors.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Add Neighbor button to add more Neighbors.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Perform 15 Actions in Neighboring Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Perform actions in Neighboring Kingdoms.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Attain 100 Reputation.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation.}

dialog.title: title:{Neighborly Luck}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Alastair's book says that goodwill brings luck. Let's get neighborly so we can break the curse on my chest!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Even if helping your Neighbors didn't make us luckier, we've got Friends to help us fight The Gloombringer!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Bash all Thieves}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Thieves to banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Cave Peril}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{The dragon is gone, but the cave is not yet yours. Banish those foul Beasties!}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{At last, the cave is yours! Someone sure tried to keep you out of it. I wonder why?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is one lucky ________.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore to find Sonja's Treasure Chest. A skeleton is guarding it from Beasties.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click in the Gloom to explore.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Wooden Clubs, just in case the Beasties show up!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 6 Spyglasses to search for the chest.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Spyglasses.}

dialog.title: title:{Finders Keepers}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Well, we're not getting any luckier just standing here. Look for my cursed Treasure Chest!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{You found my chest! Someone's getting lucky.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 10 Candles}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft or trade with neighbors for Candles.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 5 Iron Picks}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Iron Picks or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Crystal Cave}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Well done. Restore this cave, and it will prove to be a steady source of Exploration Crystals.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Remarkable! Return to this cave every day to collect Exploration Crystals so your Kingdom can continue to grow!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is ready to face a dreaded curse... right after some Bubbly Grog!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Grog is great for boosting confidence. And removing rust!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Bubbly Grog and face your fears!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 8 Whetstones to sharpen Sonja's sword. You never know when Beasties might turn up!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Whetstones.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Beat up a Neighbor's tree to psych yourself up to face the curse. Chop 15 times.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Chop trees in neighboring Kingdoms.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 15 Bubbly Grog to help Sonja face her fear.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Fear Not}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{As if the Gloom weren't bad enough, we've got a curse to deal with. Even Alastair would be nervous!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Thanks - I needed that. I guess we'll never know if we've broken the curse unless we try!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s got a bad feeling about this.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{You might want to stand back. player:[player.firstName] is opening Sonja's Cursed Chest!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Coins and head for the hills!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Get lucky! Have 2 Horseshoes to thwart the curse.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Horseshoes require a Workshop, Blacksmith and a Quarry to craft.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 8 Fairy Wings. They might have some lucky dust on them.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask Friends for Fairy Wings.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Ok, ready? Unlock that chest!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Have the Horseshoes and Fairy Wings first, then click Sonja's Cursed Chest to open it.}

dialog.title: title:{Good Luck}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Alright, I've got a couple more ideas to get us some luck. But then we're going to OPEN that chest!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Argh, I KNEW that witch put a curse on the chest! We can't touch it without Beasties appearing!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Got any luck to spare?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has a bright idea to defeat the cursed chest. Wish them luck!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Cross your fingers and grab some Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gotta get out of here and think. Visit 8 Neighbors and contemplate the curse.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click a Neighbor from the Neighbor bar below to visit them.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Get 2 Thief Cloaks. Maybe we can trick the curse by looking like Beasties!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Thief Cloaks from banishing Thieves.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Cross your fingers and open the Cursed Chest!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click Sonja's Cursed Chest to open it.}

dialog.title: title:{Curse Proof}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Looks like we'll have to be clever if we want to open that chest. Surely we can outwit this witch!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{That blasted witch is smarter than I thought. Summoning Beasties? She must hang around that sneaking old sorcerer. Hmm...}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Cha-Ching! player:[player.firstName] found some treasure!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] lifted the curse on Sonja's treasure chest and has loot to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get lucky and grab 250 Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Crystals might defeat this curse. Get 6 Crystal Shards.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Collect Crystal Shards by banishing Beasties.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 2 Exploration Crystals to dispel the Gloom curse.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Did you break the curse? Open the chest to find out!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Have the 2 Crystals then click the chest to open it.}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{You found my old ship's Anchor, too! I'll be needing that soon... please hold onto it for me!}

dialog.title: title:{Crystal Clear}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{The witch's curse must be powered by GLOOM! We're in luck - dispelling that foul fog is your specialty!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Hooray! Here's your share of the loot. Don't worry, it was only the CHEST that was cursed. I think.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is all tied up!}

param.name: caption

condition.message: condition_1:{Clobber Gloom Wolves 10 times to find one suitable to change into a Prince.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Beasties to Clobber them. Use a Gloom Wolf Potion to draw some out.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Rope to tie the Gloom Wolf up so Yvette can find her prince. Kinky!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Cotton Leggings so the beast has pants to wear.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{The Savage Beast}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{If I can't lure a prince, I'll turn a beast into one. The Gloom Lord turns people into beasts right?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Lesson learned. Gloom Wolves do NOT like wearing pants! Can't a girl get a break for once?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Yvette got a wardrobe upgrade from player:[player.firstName]!}

param.name: caption

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Wool Tunic so Yvette has new clothes while she's on the road.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cotton Leggings for Yvette to wear during her tour.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Tour 5 Unique neighbors' Kingdoms to help promote Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on the Neighbor Bar to Visit.}

dialog.title: title:{Career Woman}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{That's it! I've tried everything. Time to pursue a love of a different kind - singing! I'll need new clothes for my tour.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{I love my new clothes. I’m so inspired! I think I'm on to something.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is indulging Yvette's exotic tastes.}

param.val: loccaption:{Peacocks, to be exact. Yvette asked player:[player.firstName] for peacocks for her new show.}

dialog.title: title:{Color Girl}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I haven't found a man, but people love my singing. I want to really put on a show for my next act.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{My fans loved all the colorful feathers!}

param.name: title

dialog.title: title:{Wild Thing}

dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{The leather look is really popular with my fans. Who knew they'd be into that?}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 5 Silver Ore to make Yvette's dress glamorous.}

dialog.title: title:{Shining Star}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{The Duchess of the Valley wants to hear me sing. But what do I wear to impress a duchess?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Oooo, sparklies. You're amazing. You know exactly what to do.}

param.name: title

dialog.title: title:{Fan Mail}

dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Ow, ow, ow, ow. Hands hurt. Too much writing.}

dialog.title: title:{Strange Rumors}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{There are rumors that there is an area Gloomier than we've seen before. Follow the Slimy River to its source.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{I was afraid the rumors were true. We have some work to do to spread happiness to the area.}

dialog.title: title:{The Tainted Tree}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Tainted roots everywhere! We have found the long cursed Lamont Swamp. We must stop its spreading corruption.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The taint has sunk deep into the soil. We must dig deeper to cleanse this place.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Whetstones to sharpen our Axe.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Whetstones.}

dialog.title: title:{Bridge over Troubled Water}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Getting close to Lamont is a must. Place a bridge cross over the Foul River to the island.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Now we can get a good look at this abomination! It is more alive than I would have guessed.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 30 Tomatoes, you'd be amazed how often these are used for magic}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Tomato crops you need}

dialog.title: title_1:{Concocting Tree Wither}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The external roots are gone, now let's take care of the main tap root! Bring me items to clean the water of its Gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Great! I should have this potion for you very soon. Robbing the tree of nutrients should weaken it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 15 Flasks to take some water samples}

dialog.title: title:{Root Roundup}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Take this potion and pour it into the Slimy River. It will do all the work!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Look, the mighty Lamont has started to wither! You have made a lot of progress!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 4 Horseshoes, this enchantment could use a little luck}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft Horseshoes at the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it}

dialog.title: title:{Tough as Nails}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Even in this weakened state, you'll need a special axe to chop down Lamont. I'll make you one, if you get these ingredients.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{I'll get this axe as sharp as an axe has ever been. Visit me soon for the results.}

param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is entering the Dark Swamp!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Throw this Potion on Lamont to Peel the bark}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clicking on the Lamont Tree will throw the potion.}

dialog.title: title:{Shock and Awe}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{This should peel back the rest of the bark. Throw this at Lamont. Just don't miss!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{There is a boy inside the tree? What kind of evil would do this? We'll need stronger magic to free him.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is entering the Dark Swamp!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Use the Magic Axe to Chop Down the mighty Lamont Tree}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Lamont Tree to chop it}

dialog.title: title:{Timber!}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Take this Magic Axe and take that wretched tree down!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The tree refused to be cut, hmm. Let me see that piece of Bark. It's hard like iron. I'll study it.}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is entering the Dark Swamp!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] ] is cleansing the Lamont Swamp of Gloom and wants to share the rewards!}

condition.message: condition_1:{1 Piece of Lamont Bark}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Retrieved from chopping at the Great Lamont Tree}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 25 Bottles of Ink}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Ink at the Studio or Trade with Neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 20 Eyes of Newt, the main ingredient for the bark stripping potion}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt}

dialog.title: title:{Thorny Issue}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The bark is the clue we needed! Gather more items for a potion that will strip the tree of its bark.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{With a few incantations, these ingredients could melt an axe!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 2 Chocolate Bars}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Chocolate Bars at the Kitchen. Someone better get Baz a napkin!]

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cake, Baz misses the Cake that his Mom make}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Cakes at the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Fresh Bottles of Milk to wash it all down}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Get Milk from feeding Cows}

dialog.title: title:{Trust Issues}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{I could tell you more about Faugrimm... but I haven't eaten since I was a sapling.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Faugrimm put something in my food to make me a tree. I'll never let that happen again!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] has defeated the Evil Lamont Tree!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] ] has lifted the Gloom from the swamp only to found a Boy and has rewards to share!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Put on your galoshes and stomp through the swamp for these rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Use the Magic Wand on the Tree to Free the Boy}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Lamont Tree to shoot it full of wizardy goodness}

effect.title: title01_Baz:{Baz: Dragon Hunter in Training}
effect.message: message01_Baz:{I- I'm not a tree anymore! I can run and play and leave this stinky swamp forever! But... hey, is this another trick? The last grown up who promised to help me turned me into Lamont!}

dialog.title: title:{Save the Boy!}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Take my trusty Magic Wand, it should be able to free the boy from his prison. Be careful, though! It has a kick.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Excellent! I'm sure this brave lad would be happy to join your Kingdom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place the foundation for Baz's House from your inventory}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Use the plans in your inventory to place a new foundation for Baz's house}

condition.message: condition_2:{Build (inflate) Baz's House}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Baz's house. Get all the ingredients necessary to inflate it}

condition.message: condition_3:{Be Level 21 to show Baz how important you are}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Gain enough experience to be level 21 will show Baz how important you are!}

dialog.title: title:{Tricked}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{You saved me? And no one is going to promise to fix my house, then turn me into a tree? Again?}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The old man's name that did this to me was Faugrimm. I hate him! Can't talk now, gotta go play!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 2 Dragon Horns}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Dragon Horns from the Decoration Section of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Attain 50 Reputation to spread the word that Dragons are real}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation}

dialog.title: title:{Dragons}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{I don't know where Faugrimm is, but I know where a dragon is. They're real! There's proof!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{See? Told you dragons were real. And if you see the big red dragon near a cave, let me know!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Reach Castle Level 25}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Construct Castle Pieces to raise Castle Level}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 10 Wall segments}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Stone Wall Segments from the Castle/Wall section of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{A Quality Castle}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I've tired of the campaigning life, laddie. A good situation would tempt me to settle.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Aye, this is a respectable Castle with good prospects for growth. This kingdom may be to my liking.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give 4 Gifts}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on people to give them Gifts}

dialog.title: title:{Cheers or Fears?}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{It's a plus for me if the locals are generally content.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Everyone I meet seems right cheery! Nice change, that.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 50 Oats}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops you need}

condition.message: condition_2:{Feed Geese 50 times}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Geese to feed them buy them from the Market if don't have any}

dialog.title: title:{Is Food Dependable?}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Demonstrate that provisions are likely, please and thank you.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Aye, those Oats take me back to my days as a wee laddie in the Highlands.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Fountains}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Fountains from the Decoration/Water section of the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 10 River segments}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Water segments from the Decoration/Water section of the Market}

condition.message: condition_3:{Buy 1 Small Water Pump}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Pumps from the Decoration/Water section of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Is the Water Safe?}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Place Fountains to improve and sweeten the water.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Fountains make the water better and add a pleasant background murmur.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Catch 10 Bass}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click water to go fishing}

dialog.title: title:{How's the Fishing?}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I'll have more time for fishing since I won't be fighting.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{That is a pleasant way to spend an afternoon, that is.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move Tom's House}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Design Mode, then Tom's House to move it}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Workbench}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft a Workbench in the Workshop or Trade with Neighbors for it}

dialog.title: title:{I've Made a Decision}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I'll throw in my lot with yours. Let's move my house closer in.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Aye, I feel safer here nigh the Castle walls.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Brick Oven}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Brick Oven in the Workshop or trade with neighbors for it}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 25 Oats}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Plant Oats on Farm Plots, or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest 5 Strawberries}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Strawberry crops you need}

dialog.title: title:{House Improvements}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I want additions to my house: comforts don't you know.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{I can't wait to try me Mum's tasty oat cake recipe in that oven.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Practice Dummies}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Practice Dummies in the Studio, or Buy Practice Dummies at Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 5 Iron Axes}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors for Iron Axes}

condition.message: condition_3:{Acquire 8 Horseshoes}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors for Horseshoes}

dialog.title: title:{Training Starts Soon}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Aye, I can help train knights for you, your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{This is a start, your Majesty. Give me the boys and I'll give you back the men.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 5 Beasties}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on any 5 Beasties to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Trainees' First Fight}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{You and the lads are advanced enough to take on some Beasties, you Majesty. Have a goo.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{As promised, your Majesty. Training is going well.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 5 Ham Sandwiches}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors for Ham Sandwiches}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 5 Spicy Sausages}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors for Spicy Sausage}

dialog.title: title:{Campaign Preparations}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Prepare some light food for energy to take along on Beastie hunts.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{A meaty sandwich will be a welcome boost of energy on a long march.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 5 Beasties}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on any 5 Beasties to Banish them}

dialog.title: title:{Into the Breach, Lads}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Drive off these new Beasties. We fought too hard to let them through now.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Well done, your Majesty. You met that threat face on and turned it back.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 1 Large Banner}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Banner at the Studio, buy at the Market, or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 1 Flag}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft a Flag at the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Mark the Day}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I say we mark those victories with a suitable banner, your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{All who see the banner will remember what was accomplished this day by we few, we happy few.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has cabin fever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] just built a log cabin for Rafael, their newest subject in CastleVille!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Collect Wood Logs for your own cabin.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Wood Logs}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place the house foundation for your new subject.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Find Rafael's house in the Buildings section of your inventory}

effect.message: messag01_Yvette:{Oh my, a little birdy has brought a note! It looks like it's for you.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Build Rafael's House to add him to your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Collect and ask friends for materials to complete Rafael's house.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Tax Rafael's house.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on houses to collect taxes.}

effect.message: message01_Yvette:{Ooh, you've found another subject! A handsome one!}

message01_Antonio:{My friend! While I was trapped out in the Shadows, I saw others. One in particular caught my eye. We must rescue this stranger from whatever is out there! Accept my quest to find her!}

dialog.title: title:{Good Foundations}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{It would be my honor to join your Kingdom. Let us make it official by building my new home!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Thank you, my friend. Ah, it feels good to be away from the Gloom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 20 Hard-Boiled Eggs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Hard-Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Potatoes}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Grow Potatoes on an Empty Farm Plot or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_3:{Place 3 Nature Items}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy in the Nature tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Sorry George}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{George ruined our ogre trap! If he wants food, he'll get it – with flowers on top!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Mm... 'smack'... mm! What? You thought this food was for George? I'm still hungry! I was a tree!!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give 1 Carrot Cake to George to apologize}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Carrot Cake in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors. Then Click on Antonio to offer a gift}

dialog.title: title:{Apology}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{I get it. I didn't like being trapped, and I guess George didn't either. Can you show him I'm sorry?}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{George isn't mad? Good. I guess a miner is better than an ogre anyway.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Parchment for a map and items needed}
condition.hint: hint_1:{For a miner, George can really draw. Craft Parchment in the Studio}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Bottles of Ink}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Ink in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{The Mines}
dialog.description: description_George:{I've been trapped worse places, like in the mines. Say, if you give me parchment, I'll draw a map...}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{I like rocks. I saw a shiny one down a shaft. Couldn't get to it myself. I'm too big.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give 1 Supply List to Baz}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Baz to offer the gift}

dialog.title: title:{Take a Child to Work Day}
dialog.description: description_George:{Say, if you want the shiny, Baz is small enough to reach it! Give him this list. See what he does.}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{Baz is ready to go mining? Oh boy, oh boy! I love showing people rocks!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Iron Pick, extra small}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft an Iron Pick in the Workshop}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Candles to see deep in the mine}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Candles in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clear 3 Flowers}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Clear any flower, if you run out, plant more from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Miner's Supply List}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{George wants me to find treasure? After I trapped him? Wowie! Let's get what's on the list!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The flowers are so I don't stink?! Ha! I can't stink – I'm Baz, treasure-hunter!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give an extra Stone to George and ask about the smell}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Stones can be gathered from mining. Click on George to offer the gift}

dialog.title: title:{Stench like No Other}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{This mined rock smells like a farm, mixed with rotten eggs, mixed with skunk! Can George smell it?}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{There must be a horrible stink-monster in the mines guarding the treasure!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Clear 10 sweet smelling Flowers}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clear any flower, if you run out, plant more from the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Candles}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Candles in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Mine Odors}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{A stink? I don't smell a stink! Is that what scared Baz? He dropped the supplies, and we need more!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{Ahh, supplies! Now we can mine that shiny rock! Say, where's Baz?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Angle Finder}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This will point straight at the stink-monster. Craft an Angle Finder in the Workshop}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Collection Box to hold the special gas tracker parts}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft a Collection Box in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 4 Pails of Water}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Why water? Ask Alastair. Pails of Water come from fishing}

dialog.title: title:{Finding the Root Cause}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{Alastair gave me plans for a Gas Tracker. I'll find the smelly source – and the treasure!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{The treasure is mine! Ours! Um – gotta go!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 1 New Barrel to bathe in}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Barrels in the Market, Nature Category}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 20 Chili Peppers}
condition.hint: hint_2:{You need a hot bath to get really clean. Click on Empty Farm Plots and grow the number of Chili Peppers needed or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 8 Pails of Water}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Pails of Water come from fishing}

dialog.title: title:{Smelly Everywhere}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{The gas was everywhere! It's horrible! I took the treasure and ran for it! And I need a bath.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{I'm not exaggerating! I really do stink. Does George know what the stink is?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft a Chef's Salad to detox George}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Chef Salad in the Kitchen}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 30 Oats}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Fiber, that should help George! Click on Empty Farm Plots and grow the number of Oats needed or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Bottles of Milk}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Pails of Water come from fishing}

dialog.title: title:{Odors are Mine}
dialog.description: description_George:{What stink? There was Carrot Cake, then – Oh! It was the Cake. It makes me umm... I need a salad!}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{Uh oh. I shouldn't have had the milk, too. It doesn't always agree with me!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Give a Chocolate Bar to George as a gift}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Chocolate Bar in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors. Click on George to offer the gift}

dialog.title: title:{Monster Identified}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{George is the stink monster, just like he was the ogre! Maybe this will turn him back to normal.}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{A real monster? I can't believe it! A real monster?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Make 1 Iron Axe}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Can always use an extra axe! Craft a Iron Axe in the Workshop}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 6 Bundles of Arrows to take care of any danger}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Bundles of Arrows in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Hot Buns *in case of snack attack}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Adventure Supplies}
dialog.description: description_George:{Much better! I owe Baz a real monster. Think my picks are enough to keep him safe?}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{It's been awhile since I held an arrow, but we'll need it if the dragon attacks! Oops! Spoiler!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 5 Buttercream Icing for smearing on Baz's shield}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Buttercream Icing in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Get 10 Fresh Ogre's Belches}
condition.hint: hint_2:{These smell almost as bad as the Stink-Monster! Gather Ogre's Belch from clearing grasses}

dialog.title: title:{Best Day Ever}
dialog.description: description_Baz:{George says coating my shield will make it fireproof! From what? I-I'm not scared at all!}
dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{It's a dragon! I'm not afraid of dragons! I'm Baz, dragon-slayer!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore to the Dragons home territory}
condition.hint: hint:{Select the territory with Dragon bones and explore there}

dialog.title: title:{The Dragon's Home}
dialog.description: description_George:{Here there be dragons. If we don't find them, they might find us!}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{I think Baz was a little relieved the dragon was gone. So was I! But we're ready for the next one.}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{With your Great Hall completed, you can explore the land! Search for Wizard Alastair, who will help you gain your Crown!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore 1 Gloomy Area}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on a Gloomy Area to explore}

dialog.title: title:{Piercing the Gloom}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Excellent! Now that you have explored, you're closer to locating Alastair. Find him, and he'll help you earn your crown!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{You've uncovered Alastair's satchel. He must be close! Keep exploring and find Alastair!}

param.name: title
param.val: feedTitle:{player:[player.firstName] is entering the Dark Swamp!}

param.name: caption
param.val: caption:{player:[player.firstName] ] is cleansing the Lamont Swamp of Gloom and wants to share the rewards!}

param.name: description
param.val: description:{Put on your galoshes and stomp through the swamp for these rewards!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: linkText:{Get Rewards}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: toastText:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore the source of the Slimy River}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Select a new area along the Slimy River to Explore and disperse the Gloom}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 8 Spyglasses to inspect the area}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Request a Neighbor to send you the Spyglasses you need}

dialog.title: title:{Nightmare in the Swamp}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{We need to see the source of this foul disease on the land. Explore deeper into the Lamont Swamp.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{So, this is the infamous Lamont Tree. It is as mighty as it is frightening. It still must be destroyed.}

condition.message: condition_1:{You've found another subject for your Kingdom! It looks like Rafael has a Quest for you, too.}
condition_1:{Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke's Kingdom}

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{Thank goodness you've come! There's a filthy beastie right over there!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Build 2 New Lumber Camps}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Lumber Camps from Market and complete them}

dialog.title: title:{Industry Is Lagging}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{You need more production to support a larger population, Your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{These Lumber Camps shall be providing logs for construction very soon, mark me words.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect Wood 10 times from Lumber Camps}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Lumber Camps to collect logs}

condition.message: condition_2:{Plant 10 New Trees}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decorations tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{The Lumber Yards Are Humming}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Idle Lumber Camps are nae good to anyone.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Aye, that's the spirit. Make's me proud, that does.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 50 Wheat}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Wheat crops needed.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 10 Hot Buns}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with Neighbors for them}

dialog.title: title:{Hot Buns for a Cool Morn}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Work in the Lumber Yard tiring. Send Hot Buns to the Lumber Yards.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{These Hot Buns are a tasty treat. Not oat cakes, mind you, but still tasty.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect Flour 10 times from Mills}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on a Mill to collect Flour}

dialog.title: title:{The Run of the Mill}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{The kingdom should be self-sufficient in Grain, your Majesty.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{We feel richer now, your Majesty, with steady a supply of grain.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 10 Animal Treats}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Animal Treats in the Kitchen or trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Use 5 Animal Treats}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Animal Treats in inventory to use with animals}

dialog.title: title:{Providing for the Livestock}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{I've seen in me travels that animals do better when fed more than just grass.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Those animals love that feed, your Majesty, that they do.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 3 working Mills}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Mills from the Market and construct them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 50 Oats}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Oat crops needed.}

dialog.title: title:{Hot Buns for a Cool Morn}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Work in the Lumber Yard tiring. Send Hot Buns to the Lumber Yards.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{These Hot Buns are a tasty treat. Not oat cakes, mind you, but still tasty.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 50 Chickens}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Chickens when the are hungry to feed them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 10 Chicken Pot Pies}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Chicken Pot Pies in the Kitchen or trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{A Toothsome Meat Pie}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{After a morn's work, a pie would sit right well.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{A meat pie gives you the strength to get up and do what must be done.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 3 working Mining Camps}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Mining Camps from the Market and construct them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect Stone 10 times from Mining Camps}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Mining Camps to collect Stone}

condition.message: condition_3:{Buy 3 Rocks}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Rocks from the market}

dialog.title: title:{Those Who Moil Underground}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Castle's need Stone, your majesty, that can't be denied.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{The lads can put that Stone to good use, your Majesty.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Geese}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Geese from the Animal tab in the Market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 10 Down Feathers}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Down Feathers from feeding Geese or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_3:{Feed 50 Geese}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Geese when the are hungry to feed them}

dialog.title: title:{Feather the Nest}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{No more beds of pine needles and leaves for me.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Those feathers will make a fine bed, I am sure.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Own 3 working Fisheries}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Fisheries from the Market and construct them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 10 Fresh Bass}
condition.hint: hint_2:{When fish are jumping, click on water to fish for bass.}

dialog.title: title:{A Steady Source of Fish}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{A steady supply of fresh fish would suit me admirably.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{That's a welcome improvement lads. Fresh fish!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect Bass 10 times from Fisheries}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Fisheries to collect Bass}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 10 Fried Fish}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Fried Fish in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{That's Good Bass}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Let's test the fishing in these ponds and streams.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{You ask how is the fishing good around here? I say it is quite good, indeed.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 50 Sheep}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Sheep when the are hungry to feed them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 10 Wool}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Fed Sheep may drop Wool}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Sheep}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Sheep from the Animal tab in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Sheep for Shearing}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{A nice flock of Sheep will remind me of me younger days in the Highlands.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{Very useful animals, these sheep. It's a boon that the kingdom has a flock.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 50 Cows}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Cows when the are hungry to feed them}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 10 Bottles of Milk}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Fed Cows may drop Bottles of Milk}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 3 Cow}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Cow from the Animal tab in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Herding the Cows}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Manage the Cow Herd for the good of all.}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{A good herd of Cows speaks of stability and a happy kingdom, I do believe.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Visit 10 Neighbors}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on a Neighbor to visit their Kingdom}

dialog.title: title:{Inter-Kingdom Relationships}
dialog.description: description_Tom:{Visit neighbors and strengthen our relationships through trade.Click on the neighbor bar to visit other kingdoms}
dialog.finish: finish_Tom:{It's my advice, your Majesty, that in this world, one cannot have too many friends.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is the Adventure Club's first member!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] joined Rafael's Adventure Club and is ready for adventure, love, and treasure!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Enjoy the spoils of adventure with some free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Pay the one time $2,500 non-refundable enrollment fee.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{With your membership fee, you will receive 1 special button!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Mail in 5 Proof-Of-Banishings. Thief Cloaks Only.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Banish Gloom Thieves to find Thief Cloaks.}

dialog.title: title:{Adventure Club Enrollment}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{You seek adventure? Join my Adventure Club! Even though we fight Gloom, we can still have fun!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You are the finest member of the Adventure Club. And also the first. Sonja thought I was joking.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom just got GLAMMED!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy's moved in to kingdomName:[world.worldName]. It's party time!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Better stock up on Coins so you can party through the night.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move Izadora's Wagon into your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Use the Design Tools to move Izadora's Wagon.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Change your Character's Outfit to fit the new fall fashion!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Customize your Character any way you see fit.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have Flower Boxes to make your kingdom more beautiful.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy the Flower Box from the Nature tab in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{New Scene}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{My wagon is mobile, but it's AWFULLY heavy. Can you help me move in?}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Your kingdom looks FABULOUS. This is going to be PERFECT! Thanks, babe!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{You can never have too much color in your garden!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] took Izzy's advice and spruced up kingdomName:[world.worldName].}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some leftover flowers! Hurry before they wilt!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Flower Box}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Tend Flowers 1 time each in 3 different Neighbors' Kingdoms}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit Neighbors and click on flowers to smell them.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 6 Flowers to add a splash of color to your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 6 Flowers from the market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 7 Regal Hoes to tend your new garden.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for 7 Regal Hoes.}

dialog.title: title:{Drab to Fab}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{You really fixed up this place. Old Gloom and Doom must be so mad! Now you just need some COLOR!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{I always say you can never have too much color. Let's turn that Gloom to GLAM, whaddaya say?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] shopped and didn't drop!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy went to town and on player:[player.firstName]'s dime no less.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Celebrate the spending spree with some XP.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Get with the latest style. Buy a shirt.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy a new shirt in the Market}

effect.message: messag01_izzy1:{Do you like this shirt? I ADORE it. So Fab!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Those pants are so yesterday. Buy a new pair.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy a new pair of pants in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Everyone looks better in a new hat. Buy one.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy a new hat from the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Shopping Spree}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{I'm all settled in my -- er, YOUR -- Kingdom. Let's check out the best part of any Kingdom - the MARKET!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{That was so much FUN! I just love shopping day! Now, where to put all this stuff…}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Who should be my BFF?!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] hooked Izzy up with her two new Gal Pals, Sonja and Yvette.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Share in the Girl Power with free Coins!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Bubbly Grog for Sonja. She does like her drink!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Feed 10 Animals for Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy animals from the market and feed them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 pretty Fairy Wings to give to the gal pals.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for 5 Fairy Wings.}

dialog.title: title:{BFFs}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{No more shopping to do. I'm BORED. What I need is a BEST FRIEND! But who? Sonja or Yvette?}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Aw, Sonja and Yvette are both so sweet! I'll just have to have TWO besties!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is all Play and no Work…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{At least when fun-lovin' Izzy is involved.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Bask in the light of some gold Coins… they're Izzy's favorite color!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Visit Neighbors 5 times to plan Izzy's trip.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Neighbor bar to visit Neighbors 5 times.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Prep for the trip by performing 25 Neighbor Actions.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Perform 25 Actions in a Neighbor's Kingdom}

dialog.title: title:{Vay-cay}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Your Kingdom is way comfier than the cold Gloom, but I am SO ready for a VACATION! Will you help me plan my trip?}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Alright, we've looked around enough… I've got my trip all planned out. It's gonna be AWESOME!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Meet Minkerbelle... she's so CUTE!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{[player.firstName] helped Izzy find Minkerbelle, the cuddliest mink to ever fit in a handbag.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Have some Mystery Meat to lure your own mink!}

param.name: linkText

param.name: ToastText

condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Perfect Pet}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{My vacation spot was so exclusive that I got lonely. I know! I need a pet I can take EVERYWHERE!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Isn't she PRECIOUS!?! She's just the cutest thing in the Kingdom! I think I'll call her... Minkerbelle.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] just witnessed a Wardrobe Malfunction!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy had a minor wardrobe malfunction in CastleVille. player:[player.Firstname] to the rescue…Again.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Snag some XP and forget this ever happened!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText
