condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 12 Wool to fix the faux pas.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Tend Sheep to gather 12 Wool}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 4 Wool Thread to sew up the situation.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Whoops}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Can you believe I just had a wardrobe malfunction in front of everyone!?! WORST. DAY. EVER.}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{That was SO embarassing. Thanks for buttoning me back up!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Izzy fell off the wagon!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy drove her wagon into a ditch, but player:[player.firstName] pulled her back out. Again.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some Coins and hire a driver.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Sell Izadora's Wine. She doesn't need it anymore.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{In your Inventory, click on Izadora's Wine to sell it.}

effect.message: messag01_izzy1:{Never Again! Grape juice ONLY for this Girl!!!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 1 crop each in 8 different Neihbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit 8 Neighbors' Kingdoms and Harvest 1 crop.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Grape Juices for Izzy.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{RUI}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Busted for Riding Under the Influence! Sonja loves Grog, but I'm never drinking it again. SERIOUSLY.}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{It's grape juice for me! Besides, if you're saving the world, I want to watch it!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is helping Izzy go under cover!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{There are some nasty rumors going around in CastleVille which are TOTES not true!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Defend yourself from rumors with free Reputation!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Reputation}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Dye Kit to recolor Izzy's hair.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Hat in the Market to further the disguise.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Purchase a Hat from the market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Coats of Arms to complete the disguise.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for 10 Coats of Arms.}

dialog.title: title:{Scandalous}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{OMG! Racy sketches have appeared all over town. Everyone thinks I'M in them! I need a disguise.}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{With this disguise, no one will recognize - er, CONFUSE - me with the girl in those drawings!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Karma came calling in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy's parents cut her off, but will she learn her lesson?}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Help her learn a lesson by taking a free Gold Brick from her!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Gold Brick}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Izzy could use a loan. Sell 10 Items.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Sell 10 Items in your Inventory.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Izzy needs a decorating budget. Collect Taxes 15 times.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Houses to collect Taxes 15 times.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Gloomy day fund! Do 20 chores in neighbors' kingdoms to earn Coins and items.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Perform actions in other Kingdoms to collect items.}

dialog.title: title:{Shunned}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{OH NO. My parents said they've had enough of my behavior. They're cutting me off from my allowance!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Don't you worry about me. I survived the Gloom. I can survive this and make it on my own!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Adventure is player:[player.firstName]'s middle name!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is enjoying adventure in its purest form… battling Beasties!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{They're so good at it, they have extra XP for you!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Gloom Goblin Potion.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen, a Workshop and a Studio.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Gloom Goblin Ears... then wash hands.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Goblins come from Mining.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clobber 1 Beastie in 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 10 different Neighbors and Clobber 1 Beastie in each of their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{Hunter meet Hunted}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{With the paper work out of the way, it is time for action! Hunting Beasties,aventure in its purest form. Enjoy, for soon we will go against Senor Shadow himself!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Goblins. Filthy little things. Like children. But we must get a little dirty to go against the Beasties of Senor Shadow.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Please help and banish that beastie!}
condition_2:{Oh, thank you! And what luck, you've earned a Reputation heart. You should visit some of my buildings and animals to try and earn more!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has Boogie Fever!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] put on some dancing shoes and is a dancing machine!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Spread the fever and collect some Reputation!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 5 Regal Hoes to stand in as dancing partners.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Regal Hoes.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 4 Brick or Cobblestone Courtyard for a dance floor.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Courtyard can be purchased in the Deco section of the Market, under the Market tab.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Practice Dummy to stand in for a beautiful princess for Rafael.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft Practice Dummies in the Studio, or buy Practice Dummies at the Market.}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{You are so willing to adventure! Ahem, excuse me, you've brought a tear to my eye. Ok, it is gone. Let's adventure some more!}

dialog.title: title:{Interruptive Dance}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Hunting. Fire Eating. What could be next? Now is the time that we dance my friend. Will you test your dancing shoes?}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You are prepared for adventure on the battlefield, or the dance floor! But the Gloom, she may ask more!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] likes it hot!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] 's mouth is on fire and is sharing some Milk to cool it off!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Milk never tasted so good! Got some?}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 20 Chili Peppers.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Farm Plots and buy the number of Chili Pepper crops you need.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Spicy Sausage.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen and a Butcher.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 20 Milk Bottles... in case it gets too much.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Get Milk Bottles from feeding Adult Cows.}

dialog.title: title:{Fire Eater}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{An adventurer must demonstrate the power of mind over matter... fire eating! Please, help me prepare!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Ah, oo, ee! I believe it is enough that I did it. I do not regret a thing. Well, not true, maybe tomorrow I will.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is on top of the world!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] climbed a mountain just because it was there!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Collect some of the free Stone they brought back as a souvenir.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 10 Rocks, should be enough to make a mountain.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Rocks from the Nature category in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 6 Ropes to climb your rock mountain.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 6 Coats of Arms to place on top of your mountain.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Coats of Arms.}

dialog.title: title:{Mountain Climber}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{More adventure? I climbed a mountain with two ewes. You must try it. Eh, maybe without the ewes. They smell.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You balk at nothing! Senor Shadow and his Beasties will tremble! How was the mountain? Could you see my house from there?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is a hero!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] saved some creatures from a fire and is burning to share rewards.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Only you can prevent house fires... with a Free Pail of Water!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Manors, you can call it Mink manor if you like.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Manors in the Buildings section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Fire Drill: Move 3 Minks out of harms way.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Design Mode to move Objects around.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Sell 6 Mink Oil, that stuff is flamable my friend.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Feed Adult Minks to get Mink Oil, then sell them from your Inventory.}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{A brave adventurer you are! We will put Senor Shadow and his Gloom to shame, and also the man who said I'd never amount to anything: my barber. Let's continue my friend.}

dialog.title: title:{Fire Sale}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Adventurers fight Gloom not just for glory. Sometimes it's to save minks from burning buildings. It is true.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Well done! In the Great Yarn Fire, I saved 300 kittens. You are better off with the minks. Kittens, they scratch.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is so cultured! Wouldn't you agree?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is prepared to travel the globe to seek adventure with Rafael.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Luckily, you only have to click here to get some free XP.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Clear 1 Tree Stump in 5 different Neighbors' Kingdoms to use as drums.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit 5 different Neighbors and clear 1 tree stump in each of their Kingdoms.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Leathers for the drums.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Feathers for Tribal Costumes.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Feed Adult Peacocks to gather Feathers.}

dialog.title: title:{Going Tribal}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{As Club members, we must blend in with other customs and cultures to woo adventure... and love!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Yes, with this, we will honor the Naral Tree people! They may hold the secret to defeating Senor Shadow and his Gloom. Or not. They talk to sticks, so who knows.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is ready for a cold shower!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has been getting frisky and is all hot and bothered about the rewards being shared!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Take a bath and collect your reward!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 8 Rivers to make an icy river.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Rivers from the Market in the Nature tab.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 5 Sheep to act as stand-ins for polar bears.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Sheep from the Market's Animals tab.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Help out 1 time in 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 10 different Neighbors and do activities 1 time in each of their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{Polar Bear in Sheeps Clothing}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{When adventure calls, we must go wherever it sends us. Into the fire, eh, with minks, or into a cold shower. Yes, I have had a few.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Ah, the polar bear swim! Polar bears learned that from me. I get residuals every time they get wet. Which is more often than one would think.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Wolf Hair is so useful for creating a fake monster on short notice!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] faced what goes bump in the night and wants to share the reward!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Don't get scared -- collect some Wolf Hair to overcome your own fears!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 5 Dead Trees to use as frames for our Beastie.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Dead Trees from the Nature section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 15 Gloom Wolf Hair to put on the frame.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Banish Gloom Wolves to collect Gloom Wolf Hair.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Haver 10 Fairy Wings. We can make them look scary later.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Fairy Wings.}

dialog.title: title:{Building a Better Beastie}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Adventurers must face things that go bump in the night. But we're fresh out, so we must improvise.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Yes! It reminds me of the time I saved a gnome from a terrifying beast. Turns out it was his mother. Was awkward to say the least.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s fortune says… Nothing!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] gazed into Izzy's glowing orb and came away empty handed.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a refund of free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Angle Finder to align Izzy's stars.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop and Quarry. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Crystal Ball? Buy one.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Purchase a Crystal Ball in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Dragon Scales to enhance psychic powers.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Dragon Scales}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Virgo}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{I bet I could help you defeat his Gloominess. I just need to consult my horoscope first!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Astrology, astronomy... All I see is Gloom. That ball just HAS to be broken.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] consulted a higher power.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Alastair has the answer to defeating Faugrimm. If only player:[player.firstName] knew what he meant!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a refund of free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Make a fresh bowl of Tomato Bisque. Old Al loves the stuff.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Parchment for Alastair to write down his thoughts.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Gather 5 Red feathers from Peacocks to make quill pens.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Feed adult Peacocks to gather feathers.}

dialog.title: title:{Happy Medium}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Crystal ball? TOTALLY useless! If he's not busy training you, maybe Wizard Alastair could read my fortune!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Alastair said that inner beauty is the key to pushing back that nasty Gloom. Hmm... I don't get it.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] smells kind of funky!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Thankfully, player:[player.firstName] and Izzy are covering up the smell with perfume… a LOT of it!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Don't be stinky! Take some free Ogre's Belch!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 15 Ogre's Belches for Izzy's exotic new fragrance.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clear Grass to gather 15 Ogre's Belches.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Sweeten Izzy up by harvesting 10 Strawberries from Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Harvest Strawberries from your Neighbors. The Strawberries this time of year smell the best!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Glass for perfume bottles.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

effect.message: messag01_izzy1:{Ewww! Those belches were NASTY! I don’t know what I was thinking…}

dialog.title: title:{Scents And Sensibility}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Have you smelled some of your subjects? PERFUME, that's all I'm sayin'.}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Yeah... Ogre's Belches are called that for a REASON. Yuck!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{You look like you could use a makeover!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{With Izzy's help, player:[player.firstName] is primped and ready to prowl.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Go from geek to chique with some XP.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 15 Beeswax to give Izzy a Beehive Hairdo.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clear Flowers to gather Beeswax. This is the base for all good beauty products.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Shiny hair is sexy hair. Acquire 15 Mink Oils.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Mink Oil comes from minks. Don't tell, this is my secret ingredient.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest 45 Oats for facial scrub.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Plant and harvest 45 Oats.}

dialog.title: title:{Brush with Danger}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Speaking of beauty, can you believe that folks in your Kingdom have never even SEEN beauty products? I could make a fortune!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{My hair looked FABULOUS… until the bees decided they wanted their wax back!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is still in the running to become CastleVille's next top model!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] strutted their stuff down the runway with Izzy.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Share in the fame with free Coins.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Wool is the new Leather. Have 1 Wool Tunic.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 2 Dye Kits to make both items look FABULOUS!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Model Citizen}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Forget beauty products! Maybe Alastair meant that I should be a MODEL. How hard could it be?}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Modeling is pretty hard. But, not as hard as the GROUND I hit when I fell off the runway. OW!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{When in doubt, guess!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy hasn't a clue what to do. player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom might be in trouble.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Wish player:[player.firstName] the best and get free Coins.}

param.name: ToastText

condition.message: condition_1:{Alastair likes silver doodads. Craft 2 Silver Ingots for him.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Parchment for Alastair.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Mine 1 time each in 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms for Alastair's rock garden.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 10 Neighbors' Kingdoms and Mine 1 rock.}

dialog.title: title:{Good Fortune}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Alastair must have read his soup bowl wrong. I should ask him for a NEW and IMPROVED fortune!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Alastair said that those who perform under pressure shine brightest. That Gloom is rotting his noggin. I just don't understand…}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] Idol? Fans say…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{No. Izzy couldn't sing to save her life. Or player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a refund of free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 20 Honey to sweeten Izadora's voice.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clear Flowers to gather Honey.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Horseshoe to swap for singing lessons from Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{To Craft this item, you must have a Workshop, Quarry and a Blacksmith.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Fairy Wings to give Yvette.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Fairy Wings. Yvette wanted to be a fairy when she grew up!}

effect.message: messag01_izzy1:{Mmm, honey... I hear Rafael does a great honey rubdown. He is rather sexy, dontcha think?}

dialog.title: title:{Low Note}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Hmm… Alastair did say something about PERFORMING. I could be a SINGER! Yvette can give me lessons.}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{La la la LA! Hey, where'd everybody go? Why'd everyone run away screaming?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{And the award DOESN'T go to…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Everyone in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom turned out to see Izzy start acting. Too bad no one stayed to see her finish.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a free Tomato to keep or throw!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 6 Decoration Objects as props for Izzy's play.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Decorations from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 60 Crops in case Izzy doesn't do so well.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Harvest crops on Farm Plots to ensure there's nothing to throw at Izzy.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest 1 crop each in 6 different Neighbors' Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 6 Neighbors' Kingdoms and Harvest 1 crop. Don't leave them any ammo!.}

dialog.title: title:{Drama Queen}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Ok, maybe singing isn't my calling. I'm sure I can act. Everyone always says I'm DRAMATIC!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{I can't BELIEVE they all fell asleep. At least you made sure they didn't throw rotten veggies at me!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has two left feet!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Izzy was Dancing with the Astrologists and not even player:[player.firstName] could improve her moves.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{They could use a little pick-me-up and so could you: free Energy!}

param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Carrot Cake to feed the audience while Izzy dances.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 May Pole for Izadora to dance around.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 1 Maypole from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Rolling Pins for baking and stuff.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Rolling Pins. You need those to make cake, right?}

dialog.title: title:{Graceful}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Acting was a disaster, but maybe I can DANCE my way to fame and fortune!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{I've got two left feet. And they both HURT! At this rate, I'll never be able to help you fight Old Gloom and Doom...}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Cotton Cloth to make something A-MAZING.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Royal Jewels to adorn Izzy's outfit.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Royal Jewels.}

dialog.title: title:{Design Wise}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{That's it! I GIVE UP on Al's crazy fortunes. I'm sticking with what I KNOW. Fashion!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Oh my GOSH... I'm actually good at this! We can out DAZZLE that Woeful Wizard and his beasties!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{A fashion star is born!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{All player:[player.firstName]'s loving support for Izzy has paid off.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Take your share of the success with 250 Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Cotton Cloth to launch Izzy's new career.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cotton Legging to complete the Look.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Buy 1 costume piece to top off Izzy's new design.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy 1 costume piece from the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Fashion Forward}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{Everyone LOVES my fashion designs! I've got to get materials to make more!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{I'm a success! Aren't you done saving the world yet? I need to launch my spring fashion line!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move Richard's House closer to the others}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Richard just wants some friends. Use the Design Tools to move Richard's House}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 3 Decorations to make Richard feel at home}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decor tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{House of Laughs}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{House it going? Get it? Haha... but seriously, can you give me a hand here?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks for the help, Highness! Wanna come in and hang out? No? Okay.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 6 Grapes}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots to Plant Grapes}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 6 Grape Jam, used by 'professionals' only}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Grape Jam or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Jam Session}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I've got this great idea for a juggling trick, but I'll need some Grape Jam.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{This trick is going to be jam-tastic!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Wool Tunic, everyone needs a change of clothes now and then}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Wool Tunic or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Cotton Leggings}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Cotton Leggings or Trade with Friends}

condition.message: condition_3:{Get 2 Pails of Water to wash the clothes}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Get Pails of Water by Fishing}

dialog.title: title:{In A Jam}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Juggling jam is harder than it sounds. Now my clothes are grape-flavored!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks! I look good in purple, but the pigs were getting a little too friendly.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 20 Wood, green wood doesn’t burn too well, that is on purpose!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Collect wood by chopping trees}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 3 Candles}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Candles at the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Combust a Move}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{For my next trick: fire juggling!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{My act is on fire!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 10 Crops, to replace Tom's burned crops}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots to Plant Crops and Harvest them when they are ready}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 3 Decorations make it up to Tom}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Decor tab of the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Down in Flames}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Perhaps Tom's garden wasn't the best place to practice fire juggling. I should make it up to him.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Now maybe Tom will forgive me for his torched tulips!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 sharp Knives}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft at a Blacksmith or Trade with Neighbors.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 2 Iron Axes to add some danger to the act}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Iron Axes or Trade with Neighbors.}

dialog.title: title:{Don't Try This at Home}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Can you get me some knives and axes? I want to try something...}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Now my juggling act will be more cutting-edge!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 1 Pail of clean Water}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Collect Pails of Water from Fishing}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 3 Cotton Cloths to clean Richard's wounds}
condition.hint: hint_2:[Craft Cotton Cloth or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Cutting Up}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{It looks like I could use some pointers on knife juggling. Hahaha--owww.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks for patching me up.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Cakes for throwing practice}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Cakes in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Archery Target}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy 1 Archery Target from the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Just in Cake}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I need to work on my aim. Could you get me some nice, soft cake and a target to practice with?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{There's no way this could go wrong.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 5 Stone as a gift to George}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Gather Stone from Mining}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Spicy Sausage}
condition.hint: hint_2:{The way to George's heart is through his stomach. Craft Spicy Sausage ior Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Assault and Batter-y}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I've made a terrible mis-cake! Help me apologize to George for my bad aim.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{This ought to make up for the cake to George's face.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 4 baby Minks}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy 4 Minks from the Animals tab in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Minked}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Cake tossing is for amateurs. Let's try something harder...how about juggling Minks?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{These plucky little weasles will have audiences jumping to my show!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feed 25 Animals}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them}

dialog.title: title:{Ruffled Fur}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{When Yvette realized I had planned to juggle those minks, she started squeaking! I'd better show her I'm an animal lover, too.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Yvette is appeased, but now I have to think of a new act!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 4 Hot Buns to apologize to Sonja, the hotter the better!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Hot Buns or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{On Edge}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Now Sonja is angry with me, too. All I did was invite her to swallow my sword!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks. Maybe these Hot Buns will make things right with Sonja.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Swords}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Swords or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{To The Hilt}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I'll get right to the point: I need swords for my new sword-swallowing trick.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks! A sword-swallowing trick is sure to wow the crowd!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Catapult in your Kingdom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Catapult in Studio and place it in your Kingdom}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 4 Ropes to catch Richard}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Rope or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Cannon Ballin'}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I've just had a great idea for my act: I'll shoot myself out of a catapult! Now I just need a catapult and some rope to make a net.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{This trick is going to be a blast!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 10 Wood Logs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Gather Wood Logs from chopping trees}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Hammer to repair Antonio's roof}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hammers or Trade with Friends}

dialog.title: title:{Blast It}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{The catapult trick was a success! Well, it successfully shot me. Over the net and through Antonio's roof.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks for helping me repair Antonio's roof. I don't want him mad at me. That guy carries an axe!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Be on your guard! Faugrimm has summoned creatures to raid your homes -- look over there!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the 2 Thieves}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Faugrimm's coin-hungry Thieves will raid your houses and residents, locking them down}

dialog.title: title:{Thief!}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Faugrimm's attacks are getting more bold. These theives are cunning and dangerous. Make haste in dispatching them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{What a fierce battle! Here take this potion to restore your strength. I'll show you how to better protect your kingdom.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place a Watch Tower Foundation}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Watch Towers are located in the Support tab of the Buildings section of the market}

condition.message: condition_2:{Ask Friends for 6 Longbows}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Collect Longbows from your Friends to properly equip your Watch Tower}

condition.message: condition_3:{Construct the Watch Tower}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Gather the materials needed and complete construction of the Watch Tower}

dialog.title: title:{The Watch Tower}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{The Watch Tower provides a strong defense against Beasties. Send the word out to all of your neighbors. To Arms!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Good Work! Those Theives must have been scouts for the attack. Use this Work Order get a head start crewing your new Tower.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Clear 5 Trees and their stumps}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clearing out an open space around Watch Towers allows for more room to protect your most impoertant buildings}

condition.message: condition_2:{Ask Friends for 6 Wanted Posters}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Gather Wanted Posters from your friends so the Tower Archers will recognize their targets}

dialog.title: title:{Raise the Alarm}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Remove obstructions near the Watch Tower for clear shooting. Check with your neighbors to see if they've noticed any suspicious individuals.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Marvelous, the Watch Tower is well placed to cover likely Beastie attacks. And the archers are well aware of their targets.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Ask Friends to Crew your Watch Tower}
condition.hint: hint_1:{The more friends you have crewing your Tower, the more Arrows you'll get to battle Beasties}

condition.message: condition_2:{Supply 5 Friends' Watch Towers with Arrows}
condition.hint: hint_2:{A Town Watch only works if everyone helps each other. Visit your Friends and take part in their Town Watch.}

dialog.title: title:{The Town Watch}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Watch Towers need a crew to stand guard. Friends can help each other with this. You'll also need to keep your tower stocked with arrows.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Excellent, the Watch Tower is in place. And not a moment to soon. Ready your arrows, the final attack is on its way!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Alert the Town Watch, Faugrimm is launching his attack! It's headed this way and it's a g-g-goblin!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the Goblin}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Your new Watch Tower will automatically dispatch invading Beasties for you}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 3 Wood Planks}
condition.hint: hint_2:{The Duke has promised a special reward. Gather the materials to help him complete it.}

dialog.title: title:{Ready, Aim, Fire!}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Oh my, a Goblin! Worry not, with your new defenses you are well prepared for this attack. Afterward, gather a few supplies and I'll reward your efforts.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Brilliant! Faugrimm will certainly think twice before attacking again. Here, use this practice dummy to keep your Town Watch well trainded.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Leather Pants to look good on the road}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Leather Pants in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 6 Hard Boiled Eggs}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hard Boiled Eggs in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Hit the Road}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Tom told me to hit the road. What a great idea - a traveling show! Of course, I'll need supplies.}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{With these supplies, I'm just about ready to take this show on the road!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Jeweled Crown}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Jeweled Crown in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Pig}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Pigs from the Animals tab in the Market}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest 5 Grapes to feed the Pig}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Grape crops you need.}

dialog.title: title:{Mad Props}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{My traveling act needs some props. Can you find me a Jeweled Crown and a pig?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{These will be perfect for my comedic interpretation of Hamlet!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Flag}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Flags in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Banner}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Banners in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Advertising}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Since I'm taking my show on the road, I'll need to advertise!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{These flags and banners should attract an audience!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 5 Beasties}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Beasties to Banish Them}

dialog.title: title:{Protection}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Before I start my trip, I want to be sure the road is safe. Could you banish some beasties for me?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Now I don't have to worry about beasties wondering if I taste as funny as I look!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 10 Crops}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of crops you need.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Feed 10 Animals}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Animals will periodically be hunger, click animals with an arrow above them}

dialog.title: title:{Funny Farm}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{While I'm packing for my trip, would you mind taking care of my crops and animals?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Wow, you actually did my chores for me! I should travel more often.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 5 fresh Berries}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Clear Grass to gather Berries}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Fried Fish}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Fried Fish in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Peak Performance}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{With the beasties gone, I can start my journey to the mountains. But I'll need supplies!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{With these mountain supplies, I'm sure to be at peak performance!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 5 Chili Peppers}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Chili Pepper crops you need.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Spicy Sausage}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Spicy Sausage in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Feeling Peaky}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{My mountain act rocked! But I've caught the Ch-Ch-Chilly Willies! Can you concoct a c-c-cure?}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{There's nothing better than a Spicy Sausage to cure the worst mountain maladies. On with the show!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 5 Stone}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Mine Rocks to gather Stone}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 4 Horseshoes}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Horseshoes in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Out to Pasture}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I'm feeling better, but some fresh air will do me good. I'm taking my show to the countryside!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{These supplies should keep any problems from cropping up during my countryside performance!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 3 Sheep}
condition.hint: hint:{Buy Sheep from the Market's Animals tab}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 10 Wool}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Feed Sheep to gather Wool}

dialog.title: title:{Ewe and Me}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{The farmers loved my act! But I've got some baa-d news. I seem to have come down with the Ewe Flu!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{The Ewe Flu had me feeling sheepish, but you didn't fleece me. I'm starting to feel better already!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Pails of Water}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Fish to acquire Buckets of Water}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 3 Hot Buns}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Just Deserts}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{No more pulling wool for me. I'm off to the desert to perform my next comedy show!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{The heat is on, but these supplies will get me to my desert performance, no sweat!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Sand}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Fish to acquire Sand}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Buttercream Icing}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Buttercream Icing in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Dune for the Count}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{My desert show was the hottest yet! But now I've caught the dreaded Dune Bug!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Thanks to your cure, the Dune Bug didn't overcome my sunny disposition!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 5 Wood Logs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Chop Trees to gather 5 Wood Logs}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Barrel}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft a Barrel in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Sea You Later}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{I've still got sand in my ears - and other places - but the show must go on. On a boat, that is!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{These sea-faring supplies should see me safely to my next performance. Time to set sail!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Iron Pick}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft an Iron Pick in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 3 Bubbly Grogs}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Bubbly Grogs in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Sea Sickness}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Ah, the ocean breeze, the hearty laughs of grog-soaked pirates… the Barnacle Bumps…}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{I was in over my head with the Barnacle Bumps, but now that I'm cured, things are going swimmingly!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Meat Sandwich}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Meat Sandwiches in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Iron Axe}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Iron Axe in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Time to Leaf}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{My keel is ship-shape again, so it's time for my final show on the road. To the forest!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{Now that I've got these forest supplies, I won't stick around. Thanks for rooting for me!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Cotton Cloths}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Cotton Cloths in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Flaxseed Oil to cure Richard}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Faxseed Oil in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Out of the Woods}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Haha! My forest act left 'em pining for more! But they left me with something, too. Hardwood Fever!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{My axe is polished and my fever has passed. I'm ready to put on my next show - in your Kingdom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Opera House in your Kingdom}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy an Opera House from the Market's Castles/Buildings tab and build it}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 10 Grapes for the crowd to enjoy}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Grape crops you need.}

dialog.title: title:{Stage Right}
dialog.description: description_Richard:{Performing on the road was great practice. Your subjects are gonna laugh til they cry!}
dialog.finish: finish_Richard:{They laughed! They really laughed! And it this time, it was at my JOKES, not me!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Rope}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Harvest 5 Flax}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Empty Farm Plots and buy the number of Flax crops you need.}

dialog.title: title:{All Tied Up}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Tie me down! I need to practice knot-work before I return to sea.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{These knots will hold even if it gets rough at sea. And knowing me, it will!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Wood Plank}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Wood Planks in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 5 River tiles}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Water from the Decoration/Water tab in the Market}

dialog.title: title:{Walk the Plank}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I've walked plenty of planks in my time, but I could stand to walk one more!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Walking the plank… now that takes me back!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Fish for 1 Bucket of Water}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Fish to get 1 Bucket of Water}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 5 Wool}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Gather Wool from Sheep}

condition.message: condition_3:{Acquire 1 Wool Cloth}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft Wool Cloth in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Swab the Deck}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Swabbing the deck used to be one of my favorite passtimes.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Now that's a well-swabbed deck. I haven't lost my touch!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gather 5 Wood Logs}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Chop Trees to get Wood Logs}

dialog.title: title:{Raise the Mast}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Find me some Wood, and I'll raise a mast!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{My mast-raising skills are renowned in every port!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Leather}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Leather in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Glass}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Glass in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Lost at Sea}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I lost my telescope in a fateful shipwreck. I'll need to make another before my next voyage!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{With this telescope, I'll be able to see ships a-comin' on the horizon!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Knife}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft a Knife in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Rope}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Boarding Party}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Let's throw a boarding party!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{This is fun! Usually I'M the one getting boarded!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Parchment}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Parchment in the Studio or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 1 Ink}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Ink in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{X Marks the Spot}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{With a treasure map, I'll never need help finding my Chest again!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{With this map, I'll be able to keep track of my booty!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 6 Bubbly Grog}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Grog in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

condition.message: condition_2:{Acquire 6 Hot Buns}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Craft Hot Buns in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Hearty Meal}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I'll need a hearty meal before I build my new ship. Time for a pirate's dinner!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Nothing like Grog and Hot Buns to make a girl feel like a pirate again.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 1 Bubbly Grog as a gift to Antonio}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Grog in the Kitchen or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Feeling Groggy}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{I wonder if Antonio can hold his Grog? Let's find out.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Antonio loved the grog! I'll make a pirate out of him yet.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Acquire 3 Rope}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Rope in the Workshop or Trade with neighbors}

dialog.title: title:{Ship Out}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Maybe the shore's not so bad a place to be. I've got a loyal crew right here!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Now everyone can get a taste of my Grog!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Torchlight makes everyone look good. As does squinting.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] helped Rafael set up an intimate dinner.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Didn't get an invite? Take some Reputation to soften the blow.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Reputation}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 1 Table for an intimate dinner for the stranger and Rafael.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Decorations from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 2 Torches to add that romantic glow.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Decorations from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Chicken Meat (and 0 Salmonella).}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Get Chicken Meat from feeding Adult Chickens. Feed Chickens to grow them into adulthood.}

dialog.title: title:{Woo Who?}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Defeating Senor Shadows' Beasties didn’t bring her out. She is both beautiful AND tough. We've never met, but already I am in love! Prepare to be wooed!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{And still nothing! Why does the stranger risk herself in the Gloom? Oddly, this makes me like her more. Still, we need to rescue her!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] just rescued the Duke!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is gaining experience by beating up bad guys in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Join the good fight and get some free XP.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get XP}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Visit your new neighbor the Duke.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke. Click on animals in the Duke's Kingdom to help him}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banishing the invading beastie!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on beasties in the Duke's Kingdom to help him.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Earn 5 Reputation by helping your new neighbor.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Help neighbors to earn Reputation}

effect.title: invite_friends_title1:{Play with Friends!}
effect.message: invite_friends_message1:{Remember, my Kingdom is strong because of allies! Having more Neighbors gives you valuable Reputation, Energy and useful items. I suggest you add Friends as soon as possible!}

effect.Info1: Invite your friends to play CastleVille!

effect.title: invite_friends_title2:{Play with Friends!}
effect.message: invite_friends_message2:{Remember, my Kingdom is strong because of allies! Having more Neighbors gives you valuable Reputation, Energy and useful items. I suggest you add Friends as soon as possible!}

effect.Info1: Invite your friends to play CastleVille!

dialog.title: title:{Visiting Heirs}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Oh no, Beasties are in my Kingdom! Please come to my aid - I can't handle them without you!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Thanks for your help! With every Kingdom working together, we can stop the Beasties and the Gloom!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Whew! What stinks?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{If player:[player.firstName] smells a little funny, it's just the Ogre's Belches. Probably.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Hold your nose and grab some Ogre's Belches!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Ogre's Belch}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Arrgh! Tear up some Grass in frustration.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on nature items like Grass to clear them.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 10 Ogre's Belch to melt the Chest's lock.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Clear Grass to gather Ogre's Belch.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Melt the lock on the Treasure Chest.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Get the Ogre's Belch, then click the chest to melt the lock.}

dialog.title: title:{Melt the Lock}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{If we can't break the lock, maybe we can melt it! Some Ogre's Belches should do the trick.}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{Ugh! All the Ogre's Belch did was make a stink. The chest is still locked!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Hide your wallet, hide your keys…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is pickin' all the locks up in here!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get to clickin' below before the free Coins are gone!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 7 Fairy Wings to waft the stench away.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Fairy Wings.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 5 Animal Bones to pick the chest's lock.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Banish Beasties to gather Animal Bones.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Try to open the Treasure Chest}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Collect the Animals bones, then Click to open the Treasure Chest.}

dialog.title: title:{Pick the Lock}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Maybe we can pick the lock open... AFTER clearing up those stinky Ogre's Belches!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{I think I heard the lock click. Let's see what's inside!}

effect.message: message01_Sonja:{You found the Crossbones from my old ship, the Santa Lucia! I've got plans for that... will you keep it safe for me?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Everyone is after my booty!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] grabbed a handful of loot and wants to share the rewards!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a rare Gold Brick before they're all gone!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Gold Brick}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Sell 1 Diamond}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Use the Sell option in the Designer Tools to sell items.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banish 2 Thieves before they steal the treasure!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Earn rewards like crafting materials and Crystal Shards by banishing Beasties.}

dialog.title: title:{Sonja's Booty}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{That Foul Wretch's Thieves are trying to steal our treasure! Hurry and banish them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{That was a close one. If I ever catch him, I'll make shark bait of that wretched wizard!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has some impressive equipment!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] helped Yvette get ready to venture into the Gloom and wants to equip you, too!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Be prepared. Collect a Crystal Shard! You'll need it!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Change your Character's Outfit.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Customize your Character any way you see fit!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Chocolate Bars to snack on while you explore for Yvette's Old Farm House.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Don't forget to feed the animals before you leave. Feed 2 Animals to Adulthood.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{It takes multiple feedings to grow an animal to adulthood. You can also craft or buy Animal Treats to do it instantly.}

dialog.title: title:{Big Trip}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{We could be searching for my home for days! Weeks even! I've never been on a big trip. What do we need?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{I'm so excited! The Old Farmhouse is near a river. Don't fall in! I don't have a clothes line.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Oh, here I am!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] made sure Yvette didn't get lost in the Gloom and found something worth sharing!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Don't lose out -- collect free Energy!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore to find Yvette's Old Farmhouse in the Gloom. The foundation is probably all that's left.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{It is probably in disarray now and just the foundation is there. Yvette mentioned it had red mushrooms growing by it.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 6 Spyglasses to look for Yvette's Old Farmhouse.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask Friends for Spyglasses.}

dialog.title: title:{Homecoming}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I'm not sure which way my home is. I get so lost, the Gloom can't find me. 'It's by a river' doesn't help?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{You did it! You saved my old Farmhousefrom the Gloom! Daddy, are you home? Daaaaa-ddy! Where'd he go?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] cleaned house!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] fixed up my house and found some Coins lying around!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some dust free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Buy 4 Rivers to replace the old dried up creek.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy Rivers from the Market in the Nature tab.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear all the roots in the yard.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on roots to Clear them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Build Yvette's Old Farmhouse.}

dialog.title: title:{Rebuilding}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Looks like Daddy hasn't been home for a while. Can you help fix up the house so the Gloom can't come back?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Oo, it's all warm and inviting again, and I bet it's Gloom-proof! Wish it were also mess-proof.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{What does it say?!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] uncovered a note from Yvette's father in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Put on your sleuth hat and collect some XP!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Wool Cloth to dust the house with.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You must have a Studio and Tailor to craft this item. Purchase Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Earn 25 Reputation Hearts.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit Neighbors and do activities in their Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Clear away 5 rocks, plants or trees.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Some nature items will take several clicks to clear. You can also clear tree stumps.}

dialog.title: title:{Housekeeping}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I'll tidy up inside the house. If you clean the yard, it'll inspire others to stand up to the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Whew! All that cleaning was a lot of wo - you found what? A note? From Daddy?! W-what does it say?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{It's elementary, my dear player:[player.firstName]…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is on the way to unraveling a mystery, and wants to celebrate with you!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{There's no mystery in how to collect your Coins! Get some now!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 8 Regal Hoes to help with the clearing.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Regal Hoes.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tend the flowers near Yvette's old farmhouse.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Flowers take some time until you can tend them again.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Banish 5 Beasties, nasty creatures of the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on Beasties to Banish them.}

dialog.title: title:{Flower Arranging}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Daddy's favorite? Oh! His favorite flowers! Let's find some - Uh oh... I think some Beasties are lurking!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{I love the way these flowers smell. You found another note? It must be another clue!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] solved a big problem with some Pizza!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{True story. player:[player.firstName] wants to share a slice of rewards!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Would you like some extra cheese with your free XP?}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Hot Buns.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cloth Apron. Don't want those Hot Buns getting on your outfit!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Put your Cooking to good use. Use one cooking item.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Lunch Time}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{My favorite food? Pizza! But what does that have to do with portals or the Gloom? Only one way to find out.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{That pizza was good, but it was missing something. I know, mushrooms!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{A-HA! player:[player.firstName] is now clued in!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has a lead on a disappearance and wants to share the reward!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get your own clue by collecting some Reputation!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Fish in 10 Neighbors Kindgoms.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit a Neighbor and fish in there pond or barrel! Don't wast yours! fish from it.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear 3 Mushrooms.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Mushrooms to Clear them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Use 1 Fishing Bait from your Inventory.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Fishing Bait will yeild better loot! You can either Craft or purchase Fishing Bait.}

dialog.title: title:{Fishing Trip}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I always liked mushroom pizza. Daddy's next clue must be near the mushrooms by the river.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{You found the note! Daddy must have a secret so big, he's afraid the Gloomy One will find out about it.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has me feeling groggy.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] rounded up some grog and wants to share in the fun.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab a glass and collect some Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Help Yvette relax by Harvesting 10 Strawberries in your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Empty Farm Plots to plant Crops.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Relax Yvette with some Bubbly Grog. She'll need 3.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 pails of water to make Yvette a yummy bath.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Fish to uncover the Pail and other items in the pond. It takes some time for the pond to restock.}

dialog.title: title:{Me Time}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Overcome my fear? There's the Gloom, angry bunnies... I should relax before I really scare myself.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{How sweet of you! Daddy always hid grog in the cellar, where I was afraid - Of course! The cellar!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{This could get very scary very fast!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] faced the creepy cellar and found a golden egg.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Stay brave and grab some Eggs.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Candles to light the way.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Knife for Yvette to use as protection.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Whetstones to get the knife nice and sharp.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Whetstones.}

dialog.title: title:{Afraid of the Dark}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Daddy hid the treasure in our cellar! I was too afraid to go there, but not now, with all the Gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Eeek! Okay, still scared of the dark. But I found a note - and a golden egg! Will it stop the Gloom?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] gave Yvette a happy ending!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] just experienced the stuff of fairytales and wants to share the fun with you!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get your fairytale and collect some Energy now!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 10 Parchment for Yvette's note.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have a Bottle of Ink to write with.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 10 different Neighbors' Kingdoms to leave copies of the note - just in case.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on the Neighbor bar to visit their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{The Golden Egg}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{My father is so brave! I’m staying to fight the Gloom. I'll leave him a note if - WHEN - he returns.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{The egg hatched into a golden goose! Don't see that every day. It's a sign we'll beat the Gloom!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is a knock out!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] doomed some Gloom by knocking out some Beasties.}

param.val: locdescription:{Get some Energy so you can put up a fight!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the 2 Wolves.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Beasties to Banish them.}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{The path to saving your Kingdom lies before you! Be warned - it will not be easy.}

dialog.title: title:{En Guarde!}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your first task is a simple one... FIGHT!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You are able to banish the creatures of the Gloom. Prove yourself a worthy ruler, and you may even defeat the dark wizard responsible for them.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is spreading the wealth.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] provided for the Kingdom and wants to provide for you, too.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Provide 4 Houses as shelter from the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy in the Buildings section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax 7 houses for coins.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Houses to tax them, you can tax your Neighbors' houses too!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest 20 Wheat to feed your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Crops from the Nature section of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Food and Shelter}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your most important task as a proper ruler is to provide for your people. They will need homes and a source of food.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Good Work. As you provide for the needs of your people you will earn coins to build your Castle.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is really cookin'!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] mastered a few meals and whipped up your favorite.}

param.name: description

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Kitchen for your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy from the Crafting tab of the Buildings section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 4 Items from your Kitchen.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Kitchen and pick 4 items to Craft.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Put your Cooking to good use. Use one item made in the Kitchen from your inventory.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory. Use one that was crafted in your Kitchen.}

dialog.title: title:{Thought for Food}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{To truly provide for your kingdom, you must learn to make use of the materials provided by your crops and animals.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Mmm. There's no substitute for a well cooked meal. A happy Kingdom is the key to fighting the Gloom.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is enjoying a Regal Hoe!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Move 5 items to make room for the Great Hall.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Enter design mode and select Move to move objects.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear away 6 rocks, plants or trees for the foundation.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Nature items to clear them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 4 Regal Hoes to help with the clearing.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Regal Hoes.}

dialog.title: title:{Clear Intentions}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Now that you've explored your Kingdom, you should find a place to start construction of a Great Hall. You may need to make some room.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The Great Hall will be a place to plan your fight against the Dark One and the Gloom. We should begin building it immediately.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is starting construction on their Great Hall!}

condition.hint: hint_2:{Build Royal Buildings to raise your Castle Level.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Place and construct the foundation of the Great Hall.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Place the Great Hall from your Inventory and complete the first stage of construction.}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{With the first stage of your Great Hall complete, the Gloom Maker will surely take notice.}

dialog.title: title:{A Good Foundation}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You must grow both yourself and your Castle. Only then will you be able to complete the Great Hall.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{This is just the first step. There are many more before the Great Hall will be complete.}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 5 Dragon Scales to make shields.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Dragon Scales.}

dialog.title: title:{Tower Defense}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Now that you've got a start on your Great Hall, you need to construct fortifications to defend it.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Good work! That Woeful Wizard will have a hard time breaking your defenses. Just don't swim in your Moat. Trust me.}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect coins to build your castle. Tax the Barracks 3 times.}

dialog.title: title:{Fortified}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You've made a good start on fortifying your Kingdom, but there's more to be done!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{An intimidating Barracks, indeed! A show of strength goes a long way in detering Beastie attacks.}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 3 Nature items to fight the unnatural Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy in the Nature tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 6 Fairy Wings. The dust makes everything sparkle!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Fairy Wings.}

dialog.title: title:{Outer Beauty}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{A true Kingdom is both powerful and beautiful. Spruce things up to inspire your subjects to fight the Gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Well done. Keep this up, and your Kingdom will become the stuff of legend. As will you!}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_3:{Continue construction of the Great Hall.}

dialog.title: title:{Castle Improvement}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You must earn the right to continue building the Great Hall. Show your subjects that you are worthy!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Your work is paying off, and your Great Hall is gaining greatness!}

param.name: title

dialog.title: title:{Cultural Awareness}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You have given your subjects shelter and protection. Keep them happy. Construct a Studio to provide culture and entertainment.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Just remember - all work and no play makes your Kingdom a gloomy one!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is feeling crafty!}

condition.hint: hint_3:{Collect 7 times from Buildings bought in the Crafting section of the Market that are not the Workshop, Kitchen, or Studio.}

dialog.title: title:{Feeling Crafty}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{If it's a thriving Kingdom you want, I suggest you ramp up your manufacturing with a new crafting building.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Use your new crafts to enhance your Castle and fend off the Dark One's minions.}

dialog.title: title:{Peasant Dreams}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your subjects will love the new crafting building. Wait, how many subjects do you have?}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Keep pushing back the Gloom and rescuing new subjects for your Kingdom!}

dialog.title: title:{Get Resourceful}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{With all these subjects, you'll need more resources to build your Castle.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{With a more productive Kingdom, you can make your Castle even stronger to fight The Gloombringer!}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{Your Great Hall is almost finished. The Dark Wizard must be growing nervouse now.}

dialog.title: title:{Even Greater}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The next stage of your Great Hall is in reach. Make me proud!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Well done. Your Great Hall is almost in reach!}

param.name: title
