condition.message: condition_3:{Gather more coins for your Castle. Tax 20 Houses.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on the Houses when they are ready to collect taxes.}

dialog.title: title:{Earn Your Keep}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The Gloom Maker will soon lash out against you by attacking your subjects. Construct stronger homes and earn even more coins for your Kingdom.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You're accumulating quite the fortune! But remember - a good ruler spends Coins for the good of the Kingdom.}

dialog.title: title:{Vault-y Tower}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{All those Coins, and you don't have a Vault yet? You're braver that I thought.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The Vault will secure your Coins from The Gloom Lord's Thieves, and even earn you more!}

dialog.title: title:{Diplomacy}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your Coins are safe, but maybe you should engage in some diplomacy with your Neighbors. Just in case.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Well done. Your Neighbors are important allies in the fight against the Gloom!}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{Your Great Hall is complete! The Gloom Lord will not tolerate this challenge to his power for long. Be wary!}

dialog.title: title:{Worthy}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{To complete your Great Hall, you must prove yourself worthy.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Congratulations! The Great Hall is yours! It stands as a symbol against The Gloom Bringer and his minions.}

dialog.title: title:{Royal Duds}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Now that your Kingdom has a Great Hall, you should look the part of a prosperous ruler!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{A fine ensemble! But we are not done celebrating yet.}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Mmm, turkey... Oh! Congratulations, your Highness!}

dialog.title: title_2:{Royal Feast}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Today is a great day. Let us have a feast to celebrate - and for the time being, forget about the Gloom.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Aah, a fine feast! You are indeed a great ruler. And any proper ruler needs a crown. Here - it is an honor, your Majesty!}

dialog.finish: finish_Baz:{What did we catch?}

dialog.title: title:{A Friend in Need}
dialog.description: description_George:{Sometimes your Neighbors need help bashing Beasties. I'm sure they'd appreciate a hand!}
dialog.finish: finish_George:{Your Neighbors really appreciated your help, they told me.}

dialog.title: title:{A Noble Beginning}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{It takes a special ruler to turn back the Gloom. Build your Castle so you can rescue Rafael!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{The grander your Castle is, the more Gloom you can dispel, and the more people you'll be able to save!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{A good man is hard to find…}

param.name: caption

param.name: ToastText

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{Those walls will enhance your Castle. Let's check on Rafael again, you should be able to push back that Gloom now!!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Rescue Rafael from the Gloom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Gloomy area to find Rafael. Exploring requires Expansion Crystals, which can be made at the Workshop from Crystal Shards. The Crystal Shards drop from Beasties or asking Friends for them.}

effect.title: title_Rafael:{Rafael: The Romancer}
effect.message: message01_Antonio:{Thank you for saving me, my friend. I lingered too long in the Gloom, searching for its source - and a girl! Perhaps you would be willing to help?}

dialog.title: title:{Into the Gloom}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{The walls you built raised your Castle Level. Now let's find out if you can dispel the Gloom and save Rafael!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Amazing! You ARE the ruler we've been waiting for. The Gloom Maker is in for a surprise!}

param.name: title

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 8 Love Letters. Don't get Sonja and Yvette confused.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Love Letters.}

dialog.title: title:{Romantic Garden}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Tonight I meet with Yvette. A few letters of love will dispel the presence of Senor Shadow. If only for the two of us.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{You have brought me joy with your help! Yvette's eyes like stars twinkle in the moonlight!}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{Love in the Time of Gloom: 9 of 10}

dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{A growing Kingdom requires lots of resources. Good thing wood grows on trees!}

dialog.title: title:{Cropping Up}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Taking on the Dark One's Beasties and his Gloom will make you want to eat. Trust me, I know a lot about that! Planting crops would be a good start.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{These Grapes make a great drink, and they provide Coins, too. Let's grow some more!}

param.name: title

condition.hint: hint_3:{Click a ripe crop to harvest.}

dialog.title: title:{The Plot Thickens}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{The more Farm Plots you have, the more crops you can grow - and the more Coins you'll earn, adding to your save-the-world-from-gloom fund!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Now that you can plant many crops at once, I'll show you how to grow them faster! Careful though, harvesting draws the attention of Gloom Rats!}

dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Mmm! Now you can provide food for your Kingdom. When you throw your first feast, don't forget to invite me!}

dialog.title: title:{No Bull}

effect.message: message01_Yvette:{Taxes will get you Coins, but you wouldn't believe the red tape! You can also earn Coins raising adorable animals!}

dialog.description: description_Duke:{You can earn Coins to build your Castle by collecting taxes from Yvette's house. It's for a good cause, so she won't mind!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Collect taxes from every house so you can build your Castle and push back the Gloom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Investigate the area with Rafael}

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{Drat! You don't have a high enough Castle Level to explore. Let's raise your Castle Level so you can search for Rafael.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Hurry! Click those nasty Beasties to banish them.}

effect.message: message01_Yvette:{I love my new home. I'm so happy to be living in... wait what do you call this place, anyway?}

dialog.title: title:{Raise the Roof}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I'm so excited to join your Kingdom! But, um... could you build me a house so I'll be safe from the Beasties?}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{My new house sure is cozy... and a perfect haven from those Beasties!}

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{Gather Wood Logs and Stone to build Yvette's house. I'm sure she'll make a loyal subject!}
message01_Kathleen:{Please help, that Gloom Wolf is attacking my Sheep!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the Gloom Wolf}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Banish that Gloom Wolf to save the Sheep!}

effect.title: Kathleen: The Fleeing Shepherdess
effect.message: message02_Kathleen:{Thanks for the help! I'm Kathleen. I was leading my flock through the forest when the Gloom Wolves attacked. Those blasted creatures have been getting more brazen ever since that Woeful Wizard started filling the world with Gloom. Would you mind taking a minute and calming the sheep down?}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tend 4 Sheep to help calm them down from the attack.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Sheep to calm them down.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Feed 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms to see if they are okay too.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Feed Neighbors' Sheep to make sure they are okay.}

dialog.title: title:{Kathleen the Shepherdess}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Place 8 Wood Fences to build a sheep pen to keep the sheep safe.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase Wooden Fences from the Market or craft in the Workshop.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tend your Sheep 20 times to help them grow big and strong.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on your Sheep to feed them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Place 3 Grass from the Market so the Sheep have something to eat.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy Grass from the Nature tab in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Penned In}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{You handled one Gloom Wolf, but the pack is still out there. Let's build a pen to keep the Sheep safe!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{You know what they say - the pen is mightier than the sword! Or in this case the Gloom Wolf!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 4 Lamp Oil to keep the night light lit all night}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask your friends to give you some Lamp Oil.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 10 Wood Logs so you have something to burn}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Chop some trees to collect some Wood Logs.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 4 Unique Neighbor's Kingdoms to look for Gloom Wolves}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit different Kingdoms to check for Gloom Wolves.}

dialog.title: title:{Sleep Tight}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{Sheep get scared at night without a nightlight because of the Gloom. I don't understand why the Gloom Lord likes things so dark!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{They're sleeping! We didn't even have to read them a bedtime story.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 10 Wool for the wolf disguises.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Tend adult Sheep to collect Wool.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 3 Wolf Hair to help disguise the Sheep.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Bash Gloom Wolves for a chance to find Wolf Hair.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Ask friends for 6 Gloom Wolf Pelts to make the disguises believable.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask your friends to give you Wolf Pelts.}

dialog.title: title:{Wolves' Clothing}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{If we dress the sleepy Sheep up like Gloom Wolves, maybe the pack won't attack!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{The Gloom Wolf costumes scare the Sheep, but I don't know if the Beasties will be fooled.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has seen the big picture!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{… and is now in the Kingdom-saving business.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some Coins and a glimpse of the big picture now.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{A note from Alastair, you say? Magnificent! He's the most powerful wizard in the land... an excellent ally to have against the Dark One!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Click the Full Screen button for a better view of your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click the Full Screen Options button the far right side of the screen. Use Full screen mode to get a better view of your whole Kingdom.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Click the ground and drag to look around your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click and drag to pan around and view different parts of your Kingdom.}

dialog.title: title:{Look Beyond}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{I sense great potential in you. Seek me out. If you find me, I will show you the path of the true ruler.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The Gloom has shrouded many things in your Kingdom - treasure, subjects… and me, of course.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{kingdomName:[world.worldName] is attracting some attention!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is building up a Kingdom that's the envy of a mysterious dark force.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Coins and attract some attention…but be careful!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Improve your Castle by buying 1 Maiden's Tower.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{The Maiden's Tower can be found in the Buildings Tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather materials and construct your Maiden's Tower.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Collect materials to construct the Maiden's Tower. This is the first step of construction.}

dialog.title: title:{View From Above}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Your view is still limited. Start work on a tower, reaching into the sky. It will expand your view and your reach.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The structure is sound, but is lacking its true power. Keep at it. Your work will soon be rewarded.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is venturing out into the Gloom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{With the Maiden Tower complete, player:[player.firstName] has successfully expanded their Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a free Energy to celebrate!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Energy}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: messag02_Antonio:{Alastair, he has always stood against Senor Shadow and the Gloom. He even saved me from the Beasties, when I was but a boy!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Add Crew members to complete the Maiden's Tower.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Invite crew by clicking on your Maiden's Tower and then clicking on the Recruit button.}

effect.message: messag01_Antonio:{Ah. my friend - I think the wizard's birds are coming from over here. Explore in that direction if you wish to find him!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Explore out into the Gloom 1 time.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Use Expansion Crystals to explore. Craft them Crystal Shards at the Workshop. Get Crystal Shards from Beasties or ask your Friends.}

dialog.title: title:{Sterner Stuff}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{The power of your Castle comes not from brick and mortar, but from hearts and minds. Gather your allies and see its true power revealed!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Well done! Now you can see unhindered. But finding me will take more than vision.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is armed and dangerous!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Construction of the Barracks is complete in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a rare Gold Brick to build your own!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Gold Brick}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Barracks.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You can buy a Barracks in the Buildings Tab in the market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect Taxes from your Barracks.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on a fully built Barracks to Collect Taxes.}

dialog.title: title:{A Call to Arms}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Piercing further into the gloom will take great power. You will need to construct more buildings.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{These buildings will provide you with the strength to fight the dark force behind the gloom. You are ready to explore further.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] saved Alastair from a terrible fate!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has earned the admiration of a Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Bask in the admiration and get a Crystal Shard. It will help you explore!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Crystal Shard}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Explore the Gloomy Area and rescue Alastair.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Select the new area with Alastair in it and disperse the Gloom.}

effect.message: messag01_Alastair:{Ah, thank you for finding me. In return, I will help you build a Kingdom that can free this land from the Gloom Lord. Let us begin.}

dialog.title: title:{A Daring Rescue}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You are ready, seek me out and I will aid your fight against the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The beasties are agents of an evil sorcerer who some refer to as The Gloom Lord. To rid your Kingdom of Gloom, you must stop him.}

effect.message: message01_Kathleen:{Did you hear that howl? The Gloom Wolves are on their way!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish 2 Gloom Wolves attacking the sheep before they get eaten!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Bash the Gloom Wolves to protect the Sheep.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banish the Wolf Pack Leader to scare the Gloom Wolves off for good}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Careful! The Wolf Pack Leader is stronger than the average Gloom Wolf.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Calm 4 Sheep down by tending to them. Poor dears.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on a sheep to feed it and calm it down.}

dialog.title: title:{On The Hunt}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{The Gloom Wolves DEFINITELY weren't fooled by the Sheep's costumes. We're under attack!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{Nice hit! Those Gloom Wolves are running back to his Gloominess with their tails between their legs.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 8 Map Pieces from your friends to help Kathleen get home}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask your friends to give you Map Pieces.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Care for 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Care for 8 Sheep in your Neighbors' Kingdoms to see if they were attacked too.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 3 Neighbors to tell them you drove off the Pack Leader.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 3 neighbors.}

dialog.title: title:{Long Way Home}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{Thanks for all your help! I should be getting back home... but I don't know the way because of this blasted Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{I think I can find my way now, but my Sheep are safer here. Please take good care of them! Maybe we'll run into each other again.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Yvette has another Quest. Click her to help.}

effect.title: title_01:{Berry Good Punch}
effect.message: intro_Duke:{We've been so busy saving the world from The Dark Lord and his beasties that we almost forgot about the Castle Berry Punch Festival! Let's take a break, have some fun and drink some punch.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 3 Wood Planks so you can build a sturdy keg.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 2 Iron Bars so you to reinforce the keg.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Craft 1 Keg.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

dialog.title: title_02:{Packing a Punch}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{During the festival each kingdom makes their best punch to be judged by the other kingdoms. We should start ours.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{A fine keg. That should hold more than enough punch for the festival. Hah!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 20 Wood Logs to fuel the fire.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Harvest Trees or tend a Lumber Camp to gather Wood Logs.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 4 Copper Tubes to construct the apparatus.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask your friends if they have any extra copper tubes.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 4 Stone Blocks to build a sturdy base.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft at a Workshop.}

dialog.title: title:{There's Still Time}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Now that we have the keg we need to build the brewing apparatus.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Heart be still! This punch could knock the hair off of a Gloom Rat.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Harvest 25 Grapes to give the punch some flavor.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{If you plant crops in irrigated plots they grow faster!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect 5 Pails of Water to add some body to the punch.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Go Fishing to collect Pails of Water.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Get 5 Cloves from your friends to add some punch to the brew.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask your friends for Cloves.}

dialog.title: title:{The Basic Mix}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Each batch of punch starts with the same mixture. Gather up all the ingredients so we can start ours.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Looks like your punch is off to a great start! I can't wait to let the others try it.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect 15 Berries to add a kick to the punch.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Grass or Bushes to gather berries.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Gather 6 Yummhee Yeast so we can begin brewing.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask your friends for Yummhe Yeast.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 20 Honey from neigbors' kingdoms to sweeten the concoction.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Tend flowers in your neighbors' kingdoms to gather honey.}

dialog.title: title:{The Special Ingredients}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Every batch of Castleberry Punch is a bit different. Let's gather the rest of the ingredients to finish off your batch}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Hold on to your socks! This has a shot at being the best punch this year!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Everyone has been a bit down since the Gloom showed up. We should share our punch with your friends to raise their spirits!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Earn 50 Reputation from Neighbor visits to ensure you get all the votes.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Perform neighbor actions to gain Reputation.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Tax a House in 5 unique kingdoms to let some peasants taste your brew.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Visit neighbors and click on their houses to tax them.}

dialog.title: title:{A Bunch of Punch}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Who's got the best Castle Berry Punch? Share some with neighbors and let them try it.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Your punch is a hit but is it the best? Those peasants you gave it to certainly thought so.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Change your character's apperance to get ready for the award ceremony.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Look for the character customization button just above the market button.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Visit the Duke's Kingdom to attend the award ceremony.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Duke's portrait to visit his Kingdom.}

effect.message: message02_Duke:{...Take one down, pass it around, 42 glasses of punch on the... Oh, hello there! Congratulations on winning you should have a glass with me to celebrate!}

condition.message: condition_3:{Drink 1 glasses of your punch and enjoy the fruits of your labors.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Look in your inventory for some of your punch.}

dialog.title: title:{Punch of the Year}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Dress for success. Your punch made it to the final round this year!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Again, congratulations! I'm so happy I feel a song coming on...}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is going up, up, up!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has taken to the skies to fight Gloom in a hot air balloon made from Cow Hide!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab some Cow Hide to fly high!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 10 Cow Hides to make an Adventure Balloon.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Get Cow Hides by feeding Adult Cows.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 30 Ogre's Belches to fill the Balloon.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Gather Ogre's Belch from clearing grasses or flowers.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 15 Piles of Sand for ballast for the Adventure Balloon.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Fish in ponds to get Piles of Sand as well as other items.}

dialog.title: title:{Ballon Ride to Adventure}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{Adventure has prepared us. We're ready to find Senor Shadow. Navigate the world to find him. Don't use a kangaroo. Once is enough.}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Alas, from our balloon we can see nothing beneath the Gloom! I wonder how Senor Shadow gets around.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Click the Neighbor Bar to Visit the Duke's Kingdom}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{The votes are in and this year's winner is...}
message02_Duke:{Horray! Your punch won! You've got the best punch around!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Hurry! The turkey leg is only making it hungrier!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Remarkable! You banished those Beasties... just like the rulers of legend! You must be someone special...}

message02_Duke:{Marvelous! I'm sure you can handle things. I've got to go make sure the Beasties haven't overrun my Castle, but I'll check in with you soon. In the meantime, you should speak with this lovely lass!}

effect.title: title_02:{Yvette: The Lovely Maiden}
effect.message: message01_Yvette:{Thanks for helping with those Beasties! I'm Yvette. This seems to be the last place not covered in Gloom... will you let me stay in your Kingdom?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is getting schooled by the Duke!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{The Duke has been busy teaching player:[player.firstName] about Castle Ground.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Copy off their test and get some free Coins too!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Coins}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.title: Make It Hail
effect.message: intro_Duke:{The Courtyard is a special area of the castle that will help you earn more money from buildings that produce coins. The Courtyard is the cleared area in the middle of your kingdom that looks like dirt.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Build 1 Cottage to collect taxes from.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Try moving one of your Cottages onto Courtyard.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move 1 taxable building onto the Courtyard.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Try moving one of your Cottages onto Courtyard.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Tax a building on Courtyard to get bonus Coins!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on a building on Courtyard to tax it and get bonus coins.}

dialog.title: title:{Stay Grounded}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Residents like to know that they're protected. If you put their homes on Castle Ground, they'll be willing to pay more in taxes!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{The Courtyard doesn't just have to be dirt. There are all kinds of styles to fit your royal taste.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{A Little Something Extra Quest 1 of 3}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Laying the groundwork for a huge Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is building a bigger castle and earning some bonus with Castle Ground!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some Castle Ground and bring the bonus to your Kingdom!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Castle Ground}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Purchase 3 pieces of Brick Courtyard.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{There are different kinds of Courtyard available in the Market. Go buy some!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move a Maiden's Tower on to Courtyard.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{If you don't have a Maiden's Tower you can purchase it in the market. If you have one, try moving it using design mode.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Tax 5 buildings placed on Courtyard}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Tired of waiting? Why not build another Cottage to speed things up?}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Keep this up, and you'll have plenty of Coins to grow your Kingdom. Just watch out for the Dark One's Thieves!!}

dialog.title: title:{Throw It On The Ground}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Having a hard time fitting all your buildings onto Courtyard? Why not loosen the belt a bit by buying some more?}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Nothing like some room to breathe. Don't relax too long though, there's still plenty of Gloom out there!}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{A Little Something Extra Quest 2 of 3}

condition.message: condition_1:{The Dark One's forces are attacking - stop them before they spread the Gloom! Banish the invading beasties!}

effect.message: messag01_Antonio:{Look my friend! You have another message from our wayward wizard.}
message01_Faugrimm:{I've tolerated you and your puny Castle long enough! Now you'll learn what happens to those who challenge ME!}
message02_Faugrimm:{Alastair...so you're the one guiding this miserable upstart. My Beasties will destroy you both!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Moats are making player:[player.firstName] wet!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is building a moat for their castle... No skinny-dipping!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Jump in and player:[player.firstName] will give you some free Coins.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{FAUGRIMM! He's the dark wizard I've been telling you about. He gains power through misery and wants to cover the world in Gloom!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the 2 Thieves.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Thieves to Banish them.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Banish Faugrimm's 2 Goblins.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on Goblins to Banish them.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Moat tiles to protect your Castle from more of Faugrimm's friends}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Buy from the Water tab of the Nature section in the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{Staring down Evil}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Now you can put a name and a face with all the Beastie presence and Gloom. With your help, we can put an end to Faugrimm!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Bravo! Hmm, that was easier than it probably should have been. Anyway, looks like those Thieves dropped something...}

condition.message: condition_1:{Feel free to look around! Click the House on your Neighbor Bar when you want to return home.}
condition_1:{You'll need materials to complete the house. Click the X button on the top right for now.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Bubble, bubble player:[player.firstName] is cooking up trouble!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is whipping up a magic brew!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Have a taste and get energized!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message03_Faugrimm:{My book! How did you...? No matter - you will NEVER break the curse laid upon it!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 40 Chili Peppers, this has be hot to melt his spell.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click an Empty Farm Plot to plant Chili Peppers.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 15 Eyes of Newt}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Explore to the Ancient Ritual Site to the East, I need to go there to do my spell.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{The Ritual Site just to the East of where Alastair was first found. Exploring requires Expansion Crystals, which can be made at the Workshop.}

effect.message: message01_Faugrimm:{My book! I'll deal with those wretched Thieves later...after I DRAIN your magic, Alastair!}

dialog.title: title:{Book of Sinister Schemes}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Fate has smiled upon us with the discovery of Faugrimm's Book. Before I can read it, I will need some time and materials to break the binding spell he has on it.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{You will need to be vigilant as I break the book's binding spell. Faugrimm will know I have it as soon as I begin. Oh, and I imagine he won't be happy. Not that he ever is.}

effect.message: message01_Kathleen:{Testing Testing Testing}

condition.message: condition_2:{Punch a tree}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Sheep to calm them down.}

dialog.title: title:{Kathleen the Shepherdess}
dialog.description: description_Kathleen:{That vicious Gloom Wolf is after my Sheep! Please help them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Kathleen:{Thanks! My flock is safe for now, but there are bound to be more Gloom Wolves nearby!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is so humble!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is breaking an evil spell with a Spear of Humility!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Be humble too and get some free Energy!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Yvette:{Oh no, Alastair is trapped! We must free him! Maybe a Spear of Humility could pierce the Totem of Pride!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 1 Spear of Humility to smash the Totem of Pride.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 20 Royal Jewels to smash into the Spear tip.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Royal Jewels.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Break the Totem of Pride try to free Alastair.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click the Totem of Pride that is holding Alastair.}

dialog.title: title:{Save Alastair}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{The Dark One himself! This is too much for an old Duke. Break those totems to free poor Alastair - we need him now more than ever!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Alastair is one step closer to being free! Two more totems to go, I hope we can save him before it is too late!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is sharpening their dagger!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is one step closer to releasing their trapped subjects with their Dagger of Strength.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{These free Stones will help you be sharp too!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Antonio:{Well done, my friend! Only 2 totems remain. For the Totem of Weakness, perhaps try a Dagger of Strength?}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 1 Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 10 Whetstones to sharpen the Dagger of Strength as much as possible.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Ask Friends for Whetstones.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Use the Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click the Totem of Power that is holding Alastair.}

dialog.title: title:{Save Alastair}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{I've always wondered what the Dark One looked like. Scary bloke! Poor Alastair is looking weaker by the moment. We need to get him free!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Bravo! He is almost free. Alastair, if you can hear me, hang on!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is so loveable…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is using a Bundle of Love Arrows to fight the forces of evil.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Defend your Kingdom against the Gloom with some Free Reputation.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Yvette:{There's only one Totem left! Don't give up now!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 1 Bundle of Love Arrows to pearce the Totem of Hate.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 20 Love Letters to wrap around the arrows.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Ask Friends for Love Letters.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Pierce the Totem of Hate to free Alastair!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click the Totem of Hate that is holding Alastair.}

effect.message: message01_Alastair:{I am free! Well done - and thank you. Now, we shall settle this!}
message01_Faugrimm:{Arrgh! How did you defeat my curse? No matter. I will end this NOW!}
message02_Alastair:{Quickly, banish Faugrimm into the Gloom and take back your Kingdom!}

dialog.title: title:{Save Alastair}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Oh! We are so close to freeing Alastair. Destroying that final totem is going to take an act of love!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Wonderful! Alastair is free! Now he can find out what secrets Faugrimm's book holds.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is a crafty one!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] just started crafting items in CastleVille. It's not as hard as it looks!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get in on the crafting action with some free Wood!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Wood Logs}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{To build bigger and better buildings for your castle you'll need to start Crafting new materials.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Workshop}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase a Workshop from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Alchemist Powder}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Alchemist Power from tending Neighbors' crafting buildings}

condition.message: condition_3:{Craft 1 Club from your Workshop.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click on the Workshop to start crafting.}

dialog.title: title:{Prepping for an Invasion}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{The Dark One's minions are formidable, but you can craft powerful weapons to banish them!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{As your level increases, you'll unlock more crafting recipes to aid you in the fight against the Dark One!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is going clubbing!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{This free Wood Club will help you get clubbing too!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Collect the Wood Club from the Workshop.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on the Workshop to collect the Club.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Use the Wood Club from your inventory to put the hurt on a Beastie.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Go to your Inventory and click on the Wood Club to activate it, then click on a Beastie to use it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Banish 1 Beastie.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Use the Wood Club, and a few extra whacks if necessary, to Banish a Beastie.}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{With a bit of preparation, you can keep one step ahead of those blasted Beasties!}

dialog.title: title:{Knock Down Drag Out!}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Beastie invasions can be a serious threat to your Kingdom. You would be wise to have a handful of weapons ready... just in case!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Excellent! Each weapon has limited use, so remember to keep extras on hand!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is going clubbing!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Free Reputation will help you get clubbing too!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 2 Silver Ore.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Get Silver Ore by mining rocks and collecting ore from a mine.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Sell 2 Silver Ore from your inventory.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{While in your inventory click on the Sell Button of an item to sell it.}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{Every coin helps in the fight against the Dark One!}

dialog.title: title:{Sell it All!}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Taking on the Dark One isn't cheap! If you ever get low on Coins, you can sell items from your Inventory to earn more.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{If fighting the Gloom Lord drains your coffers, selling is a great way to earn some quick Coins!}

effect.title: title_01:{Local Legend}
effect.message: intro_Duke:{There is a local legend that says magical creatures live at the bottom of ponds and pools. They are known for collecting unusual items, especially useful ones, and hiding them in the depths.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Go fishing 3 times to see what you can pull out of the pond!}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Who knows what's lying at the bottom of your pond? Click on it to see what you can fish out!}

condition.message: condition_2:{Pull 1 Gold Brick out of your pond by fishing in it.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{If you don't find a Gold Bar right away, don't get discouraged. Keep trying and you'll find one eventually!}

effect.message: message01_Duke:{You can also get the items you need from your subjects. Give them what they want, and they'll help you out, too!}

dialog.title: title:{Local Legend}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Asking Friends is just one way to get items. Try fishing in the pond... you might pull up the thing you need most!}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Fantastic! Who knows what kinds of things you can pull out of that enchanted pool.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Click on Yvette's house to tax it for Coins.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] banished evil from their Kingdom…}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{…For now. An epic battle such as this deserves some epic rewards.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab a Wood Club and banish the Gloom Beasties in your Kingdom.}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Banish the evil Faugrimm back to his realm.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click on Faugrimm to Banish him.}

effect.message: message1_Alastair:{Amazing! To be able to hit Faugrimm, you must be special! He is gone…for now. Let me study the book for a while before we try open it again.}
message1_Faugrimm:{You've won this round…but this Kingdom will still be MINE!}

dialog.title: title:{Banish the Gloom Lord}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You are the only one that can Banish Faugrimm. Do it now!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Why do I feel like he will be back…}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Laying the groundwork for a huge Kingdom!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is building a bigger castle and earning some bonus with Castle Ground!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get some Castle Ground and bring the bonus to your Kingdom!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Castle Ground}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Lumber Camp in your kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{If you haven't built a lumber camp yet you can find it in the Resources tab in the Buildings section of the Martket.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Move a Lumber Camp near some tress and see what happens!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{If you already have a lumber camp near some trees try finding a spot with more.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Harvest the Lumber Camp 2 times to see the time reduction in action!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{The time reduction bonus has a max of 50%. A Lumber Camp can only produce its resources twice as fast if it is near enough trees.}

dialog.title: title:{Throw It On The Ground}
dialog.description: description_Duke:{Did you know that other buildings can get bonuses based on there they are placed? Lumber Camps produce logs faster if placed near tress.}
dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{Mining Camps work the same way as Lumber Camps except with rocks. When you build a Mining Camp try placing it next to as many rocks as possible.}
dialog.questNumber: quest:{A Little Something Extra Quest 3 of 3}

effect.message: message1_Faugrimm:{How!? But – this is impossible! You can’t banish ME! Oh, you’ll regret this!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is armed and dangerous!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{Construction of the Barracks is complete in player:[player.firstName]'s Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a rare Gold Brick to build your own!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Gold Brick}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Barracks.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{You can buy a Barracks in the Buildings Tab in the market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Collect Taxes from your Barracks.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on a fully built Barracks to Collect Taxes.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 1 Workshop in your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Purchase a Workshop from the Buildings section of the Market.}

dialog.title: title:{A Call to Arms}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{Piercing further into the gloom will take great power. You will need to construct more buildings.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{These buildings will provide you with the strength to fight the dark force behind the gloom. You are ready to explore further.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] saved Alastair from a terrible fate!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has earned the admiration of a Kingdom.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Bask in the admiration and get a Crystal Shard. It will help you explore!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Crystal Shard}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Exploration Crystals are required for Exploring. Have 6 to dispel the Gloom around Alastair.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Craft Exploration Crystals from Crystal Shards in the Workshop. Get Shards by banishing Beasties or asking Friends.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Explore the Gloomy Area and rescue Alastair.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Select the new area with Alastair in it and disperse the Gloom.}

effect.message: messag01_Alastair:{Ah, thank you for finding me. In return, I will help you build a Kingdom that can free this land from the Gloom Lord. Let us begin.}

dialog.title: title:{A Daring Rescue}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You are ready, seek me out and I will aid your fight against the Gloom!}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{The beasties are agents of an evil sorcerer who some refer to as The Gloom Lord. To rid your Kingdom of Gloom, you must stop him.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] has their Grog goggles on.}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] enjoyed some Bubbly Grog made from Ogre's Belch.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Don't worry about the calories. Cod pieces have a slimming effect.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Ogre's Belch}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Bubbly Grog to help drown out memories of the trapped Lady.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Buy 1 Barrel to keep the Grog coming.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Barrels from the Decor section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Feed 1 Cow in 4 different Neighbors' Kingdoms, you know, for fun.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Visit 4 different Neighbors and Feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms.}

dialog.title: title:{Momentary Distraction}
dialog.description: description_Antonio:{I cannot sleep! Is the lady a trick of the Gloom meant to lure US in? We must distract ourselves!}
dialog.finish: finish_Antonio:{Iss an excelente Grog *HIC* The Gloom shtranger can't distract uss from our cow's duty *HIC* I said duty *HIC* Cow's duty? Huh?}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Can I keep him?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is giving the Beasties a second chance!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Grab a Crystal Shard and spare a Beastie!}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Crystal Shard}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 1 Workshop in your Kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Purchase a Workshop from the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 3 Wooden Clubs.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Sell 3 Wooden Clubs.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Craft in a Workshop then sell from your Inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Peace is the Answer}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{If we show the Beasties some love, maybe they'll stop being so Gloomy!}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Take THAT, Gloom! I'll rehabilitate all the Beasties, just you watch.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{Got any luck to spare?}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has a bright idea to defeat the cursed chest. Wish them luck!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Cross your fingers and grab some Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Gotta get out of here and think. Visit 8 different Neighbors and help their Kingdoms.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit 8 Neighbors and perform tasks in their Kingdom to help them.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Get 2 Thief Cloaks. Maybe we can trick the curse by looking like Beasties!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Get Thief Cloaks from banishing Thieves.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Cross your fingers and open the Cursed Chest!}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Click Sonja's Cursed Chest to open it.}

dialog.title: title:{Curse Proof}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{Looks like we'll have to be clever if we want to open that chest. Surely we can outwit this witch!}
dialog.finish: finish_Sonja:{That blasted witch is smarter than I thought. Summoning Beasties? She must hang around that sneaking old sorcerer. Hmm...}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is looking for a few good men!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] is helping Yvette catch a prince and receiving Reputation points in return.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Celebrate player:[player.firstName]'s match-making skills with some extra Reputation.}

param.name: linkText
param.val: loclinkText:{Get Reputation}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Clear 7 grass to help Yvette find a frog to kiss.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Click Grass to Clear it.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Fish 10 times in a neighbor's kindgom to try and catch a frog.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the a Pond to fish from it.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Collect 15 honey to help make the kiss less gross.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Clear Flowers to find Honey.}

dialog.title: title:{Flies to Honey}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{Do you know how to find a prince? I've heard that kissing frogs can work. Let's get it over with.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{Yeeuck! Tastes like flies. But with that honey, it might catch on.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName]'s fortune says… Nothing!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] gazed into Izzy's glowing orb and came away empty handed.}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get a refund of free Coins!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Craft 3 Candles to light the way for Izzy.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio and a Tailor. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Crystal Ball? Buy one.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Purchase a Crystal Ball in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Have 10 Dragon Scales to enhance psychic powers.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Ask Friends for Dragon Scales}

dialog.title: title:{Like a Virgo}
dialog.description: description_Izadora:{I bet I could help you defeat his Gloominess. I just need to consult my horoscope first!}
dialog.finish: finish_Izadora:{Astrology, astronomy... All I see is Gloom. That ball just HAS to be broken.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] solved a big problem with some Pizza!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{True story. player:[player.firstName] wants to share a slice of rewards!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Would you like some extra cheese with your free XP?}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have some Pizza.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{This item can be crafted after you build a Kitchen. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Have 1 Cloth Apron. Don't want Pizza sauce getting on your outfit!}
condition.hint: hint_2:{This item can be crafted after you build a Studio. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Put your Cooking to good use. Use one cooking item.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Use items in the Consumables section of your Inventory.}

dialog.title: title:{Lunch Time}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{My favorite food? Pizza! But what does that have to do with portals or the Gloom? Only one way to find out.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{That pizza was good, but it was missing something. I know, mushrooms!}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{A-HA! player:[player.firstName] is now clued in!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] has a lead on a disappearance and wants to share the reward!}

param.name: description
param.val: locdescription:{Get your own clue by collecting some Reputation!}

param.name: ToastText
param.val: loctoasttext:{Quest rewards shared successfully!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Fish in 10 Neighbors Kindgoms. Daddy would fish while I gathered mushrooms.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Visit a Neighbor and Fish in their pond or barrel. Yes, you can fish out of some barrels.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Use 1 Fishing Bait from your Inventory.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Fishing Bait will yeild better loot! You can either Craft or purchase Fishing Bait.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Clear 3 Mushrooms to look for clues.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click Mushrooms to Clear them.}

dialog.title: title:{Fishing Trip}
dialog.description: description_Yvette:{I always liked mushroom pizza. Daddy's next clue must be near the mushrooms by the river.}
dialog.finish: finish_Yvette:{You found the note! Daddy must have a secret so big, he's afraid the Gloomy One will find out about it.}

param.name: title
param.val: loctitle:{player:[player.firstName] is getting artsy in CastleVille!}

param.name: caption
param.val: loccaption:{player:[player.firstName] opened a Studio and is creating great masterpieces, if they do say so themselves!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Construct a Studio to enhance your Kingdom's culture.}
condition.hint: hint_1:{Buy from the Crafting tab of the Buildings section of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Craft 4 Artistry recipes from your Studio.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Click on the Studio to Craft.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Besides crafting decorations you can also buy them. Go buy 2 Deocrations and place them in your kingdom.}
condition.hint: hint_3:{Go to your to the Market and find some Decorations to buy.}

dialog.title: title:{Cultural Awareness}
dialog.description: description_Alastair:{You have given your subjects shelter and protection. Keep them happy. Construct a Studio to provide culture and entertainment.}
dialog.finish: finish_Alastair:{Just remember - all work and no play makes your Kingdom a gloomy one!}

dialog.title: title:{Prepping for an Invasion}

dialog.finish: finish_Duke:{As your level increases, you'll unlock more crafting recipes to aid you in the fight against the Dark One!}

condition.message: condition_1:{Investigate the area with Rafael}

effect.message: messag01_Duke:{Drat! You don't have a high enough Castle Level to explore. Let's raise your Castle Level so you can search for Rafael.}

condition.message: condition_1:{Have 20 walls to protect your Kingdom.}

condition.message: condition_2:{Place 4 Moats to form a barrier.}
condition.hint: hint_2:{Buy Moats from the Nature, Water tab of the Market.}

condition.message: condition_3:{Visit 3 neighboring Kingdoms to check out their fortifications.}

dialog.title: title:{Protection}
dialog.description: description_Sonja:{We can't leave the Kingdom unprotected from the Dark One's schemes while we're treasure hunting. How about some walls and a Moat?}
dialog.finish: finish:{Hope those fortifications are enough to keep the Beasties out. They're sneaky blighters!}

viral.description: description:{firstName:[player.firstName] accepted your request to join the crew of the sender:[sender.crewFriendlyName]. Would you like to send a gift to show your appreciation?}

viral.name: RequestCrew_Gift
viral.title: title:{You were sent a gift!}
viral.description: description:{Please accept this item:[[item(Cons_EnergyItem1)].friendlyName] in CastleVille! Could you help me by sending a gift back?}

requestContent.title: contentTitle:{You got a thank you gift.}
requestContent.body: bodyText:{Here's a item:[[item(Cons_EnergyItem1)].friendlyName] from player:[player.firstName] to say thanks!}
